      Mafia Awards 2023 - Voting Thread
      WisteriaV   25
      N Aug 9, 2024 by sheepsaysmeep
      [center]Please do not discuss your voting choices here.
      (there is a discussion thread for that purpose here)[/center]

      welcome to the 2023 mafia awards voting thread!

      (credits to ads 2022 post, which credits Euler's 2021 post, which cites apw's post from 2020 Mafia Awards, whatshisbucket, and hdgehrke, as well as nd who compiled the information about the games)

      How the voting system works:

      [quote=ads Voting Rules]Voting will have two stages: nomination and voting.

      In the nomination stage, each voter may nominate up to 3 choices for each category. Each choice that receives at least 2 votes will become an option in the voting stage. You may nominate yourself. If there are fewer than three choices that recieved at least 2 votes, any choices that recieved just 1 vote will be added as well.

      The voting stage will utilize a Point Voting system to determine a top three. During this stage, you may PM me an ordered list for all nominated choices you would like to vote for in each category. The last choice will recieve one point, the penultimate choice 2 points, etc. These point totals will be summated, and the choice with the most points will win. If applicable, the number of nominations will be used as a tiebreaker

      To vote in the nomination stage: make a single post in this thread containing your nominations for all of the events you desire. You may edit your post up to 1 day before the deadline to add nominations only, and you still cannot exceed the limit of 3. If you do so, please note in your edit what you have added. If you make more than one post in this thread at this time, fdas will angrily delete all of your posts and your votes may be invalidated. [/quote]


      Eligible mafia games are those that finished between January 1st 2023, and December 31st 2023, and Game 277.
      This means the eligible games are mafia game 260, and 262-277.

      Games by Faction Winner & mafia team
      (it is probable I'm missing a couple co-moderators, and highly probable that several usernames are misspelled, missing numbers etc.)



      Current Award Categories (categories subject to change):

      Best New Player
      This category is for players who played exceptionally well, despite being relatively inexperienced. Generally, players in this category should have played well in their first 1-2 games. Players must have had their first completed game this year. Previous winner: WisteriaV
      Eligible Newbies, (possible errors)
      -263
      itsjustWanderlust13
      lovematch13
      stayhomedomath
      -268
      lucaswujc
      dragonlouis
      Aminecraftbear
      saturnrocket
      DXtreme
      -271
      Kea13
      BluePhoenix88
      Wesoar
      AlienGirl05
      Awesomeness_in_a_Bun
      -276
      BrilliantBanana
      RhinocerosHornbill
      -Other
      aayr


      Most Improved
      This category is for players who had a drastic improvement in their games this year. This can be from games they played last year to this year or an improvement over the past year. Previous winner: ad333


      Best Flavor
      This flavor is not only the one that accompanies the game, but improves it. This exciting, humorous storyline makes its game more fun to play in, and more awesome to read for generations to follow. Previous Winner: Game 250 mathjay & NDMath


      Best Setup
      A setup that enhances the game and makes it more fun for everyone, be it. The setup must be created for the game. Previous winner: Game 257 chess24

      Eligible Setups
      260 - fdas
      265 - NDMath
      269 - chess24
      272 - Socoobo
      274 - ostriches88
      275 - NDMath
      277 - fdas


      Best Mod Performance
      This is the best game run overall. It may be because of a brilliant setup, smooth flow, or easy handling of a complex game situation. Previous winner: None


      Best Mod
      These are the mods whose games run smoothly, without any hiccups, and resolve disputes swiftly and easily. Their games are easy to play in and they don't have to be reminded of their job often. Previous winner: mathjay


      Most Dedicated
      These players got heavily invested in all of the games they played this year. You knew they would be a big part of it no matter what they were doing or what faction they were. Previous winner: mathjay


      Best Performance by a Townie
      These are the townies who carried their team in their respective games. They tried to and were successful in searching for and finding scum, and without them, their team may not have won. Previous winner: aroodman, 254


      Best Performance by a Town Team
      These are the games where town won through a significant team effort. Multiple players shared and bounced around ideas in order to find the scum, and scum stood no chance against their combined efforts. Previous winner: 251


      Best Overall Town Player
      This is the player who always creates a significant impact on the game with their scumhunting and significant influence. As a scum player, you are afraid to find that they are playing in the same game as you. Previous winner: None


      Best Performance by an Anti-town Player
      These are the players that effortlessly fooled the town and maintained firm control over the uninformed majority. They slipped out of everyone's fingers and earned the respect of everyone in the process. Previous winner: falliinqsnow-, 256


      Best Performance by an Anti-town Team
      These teams worked together to throw all of the town's plans out of whack. They hid themselves and their alliance well enough to outlast all of their enemies. Previous winner: ad333 & falliinqsnow-, 257


      Best Overall Anti-town Player
      Whenever this person plays a game, the other players all worry about the possibility that they might be scum, well aware that they will never be caught. Previous winner: falliinqsnow-


      Best Usage of a PR
      As either alignment, PRs can be very useful, especially when used right. This player used their role to affect the game in important ways, helping their alignment win. Previous Winner: Mathletesv, 257


      Best Overall Mechanical Player
      Whether this player has a knack for using their role in helpful ways, or simply manages all of the mechanical information, more PR-heavy games would not be possible without them. Previous Winner: Mathletesv


      Funniest Moment
      What moment this year made everyone laugh their butts off? What has become a running joke throughout the community? Previous Winner: Cosmosiq's reads in Game 258


      Best Post
      Define "best" however you want, just provide a link to the post in question. Previous Winner: N/A


      Best Game
      The best overall Game. Previous Winner: Game 257


      MVP
      This is the player you love to see on your team no matter the situation, and constantly fear when they are on the other team. No matter what faction they are, they will always change the course of they game in their favor. Previous winner: None



      please dont try to rig results or otherwise cheat, and please also dont nominate people to win awards for games they didnt play in or they werent the necessary alignment for

      anyway, have fun!

      Category list to ease nomination posts
      You are limited to three nominations per category.
      [code]
      Best New Player

      Most Improved

      Best Flavor

      Best Setup

      Best Mod Performance

      Best Mod

      Most Dedicated

      Best Performance by a Townie

      Best Performance by a Town Team

      Best Overall Town Player

      Best Performance by a Anti-Town Player

      Best Performance by a Anti-Town Team

      Best Overall Anti-Town Player

      Best Usage of a PR

      Best Overall Mechanical Player

      Funniest Moment

      Best Post

      Best Game

      MVP

      [/code]


      Voting has started and will end at 3:00 PM PST on March 10th.

      Mafia Game 291: Train Mafia (Newbie Game 108)
      ad333   1033
      N Aug 4, 2024 by SiddiquiZ
      [center]Welcome to Mafia Game 291
      Newbie Game 108
      [/center]


      - Important Rules -
      This tab summarizes the most important rules for easy reference.

      For experienced players: everything you need is here, and in the setup tab.
      For new players: you may find it useful to familiarize yourself with the rest of the rules.

      Integrity
      [list][*]Do not edit or delete your posts, even for typos. Just post again.
      [*]Do not OOT (Out of Thread) and talk about this game outside this thread, your role PM, or approved private chats, even if you are dead. Access to spectator chats will be granted upon request.
      [*]Do not gamethrow or intentionally sabotage your wincondition.
      [*]Do not attach files or link to external documents concerning this game. Discussions must stay in this thread.
      [*]Do not use OGI (Out of Game Information). Publicly discussed reads should be made exclusively from information in this thread or past completed games.[/list]

      Activity
      [list][*]Each "Day" is 12 days while each "Night" is 2 days.
      [*]Do not post during night.
      [*]This game uses Dawn start: Day 1 will not start until everyone shows that they have read the rules by completing the confirm task.
      [*]All times will be in Pacific Daylight Time (PDT, UTC-7)
      [*]Activity rules are 48 hours to first PM prod, 72 hours to second PM prod, and 96 hours to replacement status.[/list]

      Voting
      [list][*]You must format your votes correctly. Capitalization does not matter, and capital i/lowercase L are not differentiated.
      [*]Both bold vote and code vote formats are accepted, although bold is preferred. Refer to the Voting tab if you do not know what these are.
      [*]Majority hang is off for Day 1, but it is on starting Day 2.
      [*]Deadline hang is on from Day 1 but it is off for LYLO.
      [*]Votes are locked at LYLO.[/list]

      Etiquette and Warnings

      [list][*]Use common sense.
      [*]Do not use formatting that makes text hard to read.
      [*]You may attack a players opinion, but do not make personal attacks on players themselves.
      [*]Disagreements should be resolved in a way that does not affect gameplay.
      [*]Do not discuss rule violations by other players in the thread; contact the moderators privately.
      [*]First-timers can receive up to 3 warnings before their next offense results in a force replacement or modkill. All other players can receive up to 2.
      [*]Players may be replaced at the moderators' discretion for procedural difficulties.
      [*]All other rules are standard.[/list]

      Setup and Moderators

      [list][*]This game uses the Matrix6 setup.
      [*]Mafia have access to daychat.
      [*]All role mechanics and Night Action Resolutions are standard.
      [*]This game is moderated by ad333.
      [*]This game operates optional discord spectator and mafia private chats using the Unpaid Intern Central server. Contacts the mods to request access.[/list]

      Resources and Support

      [list][*]For any issues, you may contacts us through your role PM or through Discord (akesi).
      [*]For a list of basic resources, refer to the Resources tab below.
      [*]For a more extensive list of resources compiled by the UIMT, go here.
      [*]If this game is causing you significant stress or frustration, feel free to use your role PM to talk or vent. I may not be allowed to give you technical advice, but we can listen or help you find a better way to process events. You may also contact me via Discord if you prefer.[/list]


      [list][*]General
      Credits to Binomial-theorem, chaotic_iak, willwang123, and fdas, among others, as well as the Mafia Universe forum rules, for the rule template.

      The following are standard mafia game rules.


      [list][*]Do not post during the night phase.
      [*]Do not talk about this game's events outside of this thread unless you are specifically given permission to do so by the moderators. Details are in the Moderation Policies tab.
      [*]Do not talk about other ongoing games in this thread. Referring to anything that has happened in an ongoing game, even if you do not say which game it is, is OOT.
      [*]If you are dead, do not post, and do not talk about this game anywhere else. You may still spectate; access to spoiled and unspoiled spectator chats will be offered.
      [*]Do not use any formatting that obscures or conceals text. This includes [color=#FFFFFF], [color=white], and [color=transparent].
      [*]Do not edit or delete posts, even for typos: what goes in the thread stays in the thread. Instead, use EBWOP or EBWON as appropriate.
      [*]Do not quote or pretend to quote any PMs from the mods, including role PMs.
      [*]Do not impersonate the mods.
      [*]Do not lie to the mods.
      [*]Do not abuse loopholes in the rules. Intent will be considered during rule enforcement.
      [*]You may use your role PM to ask questions, such as rule clarifications.[/list]


      [*]Votes and Hangs
      This tab covers voting, unvoting, No Hangs, and hangs.


      [list][*]Votes must be in this format to be counted: Vote: [player username].
      [*]By default, votes should be made in [b] (bold) tags. However, votes made in [code] and [c] tags will also be accepted.
      [*]Usernames in votes must be spelled, but not necessarily capitalized, correctly. Do not use nicknames.
      [*]For the purposes of voting, I (capital i) and l (lowercase L) are considered identical.
      [*]For example, both Vote: mathjay and Vote: mAtHjAy are valid votes, but vote: mathjay, Vote: jay, Vote: mathjay., Vote:mathjay, Vote: mathjay, and Vote: mathjay are invalid.
      [*]Votes followed by extraneous punctuation that is similarly formatted, even with separate tags, are invalid.
      [*]Votes in hide, tip, or quote tags do not count.
      [*]Vote to hang no one by posting Vote: No Hang.
      [*]Unvote by posting Unvote. You do not have to unvote before voting again.
      [*]Votecounts will be posted periodically. Players may request a new VC in bold or in their role PM.
      [*]Invalid votes will not count under any circumstances. Consider notifying the mods in your role PM if you want to purposely fakevote.
      [*]Valid votes will always be counted unless they are clearly unintentional. There is no guarantee that an accidental vote will not be counted.
      [*]Votes will be carried over if a player is replaced.
      [*]The Not Voting section should be ignored if it contradicts another part of the votecount (VC).
      [*]If an error in the votecount is not pointed out within 2 days or by the next EOD, whichever is sooner, the incorrect VC will become official.
      [*]This game uses deadline hang: the player with the most votes at the EOD (End of Day) deadline will be hanged.
      [*]If two or more players have the same number of votes at the EOD deadline, the player who reached that number of votes first will be hanged. Details are in the Moderation Policies tab.
      [*]If no votes have been cast by the deadline, no one will be hanged.
      [*]Starting Day 2, if a player is voted by the majority of living players, then that player will be hanged immediately; and if No Hang is voted by half of living players, a No Hang will occur.
      [*]Upon reaching LYLO (Hang-or-Lose), votes will be locked, meaning that they cannot be changed.
      [*]Deadline hang is off at LYLO. If a majority hang is not reached by the deadline, the day will end without a hang, resulting in an automatic win for the mafia team.
      [*]The moment the deadline occurs, no further votes will be counted. Details are in the Moderation Policies tab.
      [*]If the deadline has passed or a hammer has occurred and the EOD has not been declared, the game will proceed into twilight. Players may still post, but no more votes or unvotes will be counted.
      [*]Once the moderators declare the EOD, the person hanged will be officially eliminated and their role revealed. Night will then immediately begin.[/list]

      [*]Activity
      This tab covers deadlines, activity rules, V/LAs, and replacements.


      [list][*]All times will be in Pacific Daylight Time (PDT, UTC-7), unless otherwise noted.
      [*]Each day phase will be 288 hours (12 days), and each night phase will be 48 hours (2 days).
      [*]The moderators may extend deadlines at their discretion.
      [*]The current deadline can be found in the bottom of the OP (Original Post, or post #1).
      [*]If a player with an NA (Night Action) anticipates being unavailable during the night phase, they may submit any night actions to be performed in advance.
      [*]If a player with an NA has not submitted their action by 24 hours before the night deadline, a reminder will be sent.
      [*]If the moderators do not receive an NA submission from a player by the night deadline, the player will not perform an action that night.
      [*]Night results will be sent after the night deadline.
      [*]Night will end when the moderators make a post declaring the end of night (EON). You may not post in the thread until then, even if the night deadline has passed. Instead, contact the mods for updates if they miss a deadline.
      [*]Players who are temporarily unable to fulfill activity requirements can declare a V/LA (Vacation/Long Absence) by posting the V/LA dates in bold in-thread or in their role PM. Players on a V/LA will not be prodded.
      [*]V/LAs should be shorter than one week. For longer absences, contact the moderators for options.
      [*]Players who no longer wish to or are unable to play in this game can request replacement by posting Request Replacement in-thread or in their role PM.
      [*]Players who have replaced out generally will not be allowed to replace back in.
      [*]Players will receive their first PM prod if they have not made a game-advancing post for 48 hours and are not on V/LA. Details on "game-advancing post" are in the Moderation Policies tab.
      [*]Players will receive their second PM prod if they have not made a game-advancing post for 72 hours and are not on V/LA.
      [*]Players will be replaced if they have not made a game-advancing post for 96 hours and are not on V/LA, unless they post before the moderators find a replacement.
      [*]If a player receives 4 PM Prods, they will be replaced.
      [*]If a player reaches replacement status more than once, they will be replaced.
      [*]Activity Checks (ACs) will be posted periodically. Players may request a new AC in bold or in their role PM.
      [*]Activity will reset overnight. Players will not receive prods between twilight and daystart.
      [*]If you have access to a private topic, you may request that a partner be poked. The moderators will send a notification via PM to the specified player, but this will not count as an official prod.
      [*]If a player is postbanned by the AoPS Sheriff, they will be replaced. Details are in the Moderation Policies tab.[list]

      [*]Integrity and Etiquette
      This tab covers integrity recommendations, player etiquette, warning limits, and examples of inconsiderate gameplay.


      [list][*]Do not gamethrow.
      [*]Do not discuss player alignments based on V/LAs, replacements, warnings, force replacements, modkills, or other interactions with moderators.
      [*]Do not discuss rule violations, especially violations by other players in the thread. If you wish, contact the moderators privately through your role PM or Discord.
      [*]Any significant, game-related, and intentionally exclusive player-to-player communication outside of moderator-sanctioned channels is prohibited.
      [*]Do not publicly reference OGI (Out of Game Information) in reads or create situations outside the thread that players could reasonably consider alignment indicative.[/list]

      The above rules are attempts to preserve the spirit of the game and should not affect most players. For specific details and examples, click here.


      [list][*]Do not make personal attacks. You may attack a player's opinion, but do not demean the player themselves.
      [*]Do not spam.
      [*]Follow AoPS Community Guidelines and the AoPS Terms of Service.
      [*]Be mature and use common sense.
      [*]Behavior that disrupts the game for players and makes it unreasonably hard for them to read and play may result in a warning.
      Causing significant disruptions to gameplay may result in a force replacement at the moderators' discretion.
      [*]For minor rule infractions, first-timers can receive up to three warnings, while all other players can receive up to two. A player may receive multiple warnings for a single infraction. A moderator can receive infinite warnings.[/list]

      The above rules broadly address most etiquette issues. For specific details and examples of improper behavior, click here.


      [*]- Moderation Policies -

      [*]Moderator Information
      This tab provides technical information about this game.


      [list][*]ad333 is the moderator of Mafia Game 291.
      [*][OTHER CONTRIBUTORS/UNPAID INTERNS] have contributed to flavor, setup, OCRSTM, feedback, and management of the private chat discord system.
      [*]This game uses the Unpaid Intern Central consolidated private chat system. Participants of this game will be granted access as appropriate.
      [*]Red text is used for votecounts, warnings, and other announcements by the moderators. It is also used for mafia flavor-related text.
      [*]Blue text is used for activity checks, confirm counts, and other non-essential posts by the moderators.
      [*]Green text is used for town flavor-related text.
      [*]Custom shades of these colors may be used for aesthetic purposes.
      [*]Current custom shades are: Town flavor green v.2 (#2be368) and Activity Check blue (#005dff). For a full list of custom colors, click here.
      [*]The moderators may change the rules at any time. Major rule changes will be announced at the bottom of the OP. All changes will also be noted in the modlog and OCRSTM Version History.
      [*]Players will not be retroactively penalized for violating new rules.
      [*]Major changes to the OP may be made in between games. The most important changes will be noted in the OCRSTM Version History.
      [*]The moderators pledge to treat players fairly and keep moderator interventions to a minimum; however, we reserve the right to make the final judgement in the moderation of this game.[/list]

      MG[NUMBER] OP is based on Overcomplicated RulesetTM (OCRSTM) 10.
      Current version: 10.0.1
      Version History

      OCRSTM 10 is available for public use. If you are interested in using OCRSTM in your own games, click here.
      [/list]
      Setup
      This game is based on the Matrix6 setup. This is a semi-open setup.

      In this setup, there are 9 players. Before the game starts, the setup will be randomly chosen from 6 possible role combinations:
      [list][*]Setup 1: 1 Town Jailkeeper, 6 Vanilla Townies, 2 Mafia Goons
      [*]Setup 2: 1 Town Cop, 1 Town Doctor, 5 Vanilla Townies, 1 Mafia Roleblocker, 1 Mafia Goon
      [*]Setup 3: 1 Town Tracker, 1 1-shot Bulletproof Townie, 5 Vanilla Townies, 2 Mafia Goons
      [*]Setup 4/A: 1 Town Jailkeeper, 1 1-shot Bulletproof Townie, 5 Vanilla Townies, 1 Mafia Roleblocker, 1 Mafia Goon
      [*]Setup 5/B: 1 Town Cop, 6 Vanilla Townies, 2 Mafia Goons
      [*]Setup 6/C: 1 Town Doctor, 1 Town Tracker, 5 Vanilla Townies, 2 Mafia Goons[/list]
      Other important setup mechanics:
      [list][*]This game uses Dawn start. Once all the players confirm by completing the confirm task, Dawn will end, Day 1 will start, and the EOD deadline will be 12 days from then.
      [*]Doctors cannot protect themselves two nights in a row.
      [*]A Mafia Roleblocker's action takes precedence over a Town Jailkeeper's action.
      [*]A Mafia Roleblocker can kill and roleblock on the same night.
      [*]Cop results are sane.
      [*]Trackers can differentiate between "No movement" and "No result."
      [*]Mafia have daychat.
      [*]Mafia factional kills (NKs) are not compulsive. [/list]
      Role PMs
      Note: The Flavor of the Role PMs listed here will NOT match the role PM you receive, this is for flavor reasons (this was a terrible mistake on my part), however the abilities will remain the same.

      Hello ERROR

      You are Ella (Vanilla Townie)

      Before coming on the train you... that's odd. You can't remember. You've always been here, with your friends, and while you can still feel them here you can't see them anyways. These new people seem nice, but a couple of them remind you of your more unkind friends. But you've survived their bullying & surely you'll live through this. Though you do miss your friends. And there's been weird things going on. Your stuff got moved around. You'll keep them safe at all costs. I would wish you good luck, but it seems your Fate cannot be changed in the same way as the others.

      Your power lies in your observation skills, your voice, and your vote. You may NOT claim your flavor.

      You win when all Mafia are killed, so your goal is to find them. Play towards your win condition, and good luck.


      Hello ERROR

      You are Luke (Mafia Goon)

      God. What a bunch of weaklings. Too busy caring for each other to do anything useful. Whatever, more power for you, and after all nobody could do anything better than you. It's only a matter of time before they start disrupting your perfect system though. This train is so slow too, you desperately wish you could be in a car, though you've never been outside of this train. You once told another passenger and they looked annoyed. They're going to get you for that. I mean they're probably rifling through your belongings at this very moment looking for something incriminating. That's it. You have to get everybody who's not on your side off of the train. And you don't care if you leave while doing it because of the better future it will create, which is a good thing too since the omens have not been looking good recently.

      Your partners devised a communication system so that you can talk with your allies at any time. During the night, you also collectively eliminate one other player from the train.

      You win when all Town are killed, or nothing can prevent this outcome.

      Hello, you are The Jailkeeper

      Whenever any feuds get too intense you always break them up. It deeply pains you to do so, but you've long learned that the best strategy is to isolate one of the parties completely. After many iterations, your friends made a lock that's unbreakable from either side but you're the only one they trust to be able to use it. You've come close to unlocking it early several times, but couldn't bear the thought of breaking everyone's trust.

      Each night you can target any player and will both prevent them from taking any actions and stop them from being killed by the mafia night kill.

      You win when all Mafia are killed, so your goal is to find them. Play towards your win condition, and good luck.

      Hello, you are The 1-Shot BP

      You trust everybody else on the train as much as everyone, but you can't get over the nagging fear that somebody's going to come in to your room and kill you. That's kind of odd, since this is a train, not to mention how close everybody is, but it helps you sleep at night. With a bit of help you made a system that, once it detects somebody's trying to kill you, will raise walls around your bed. But you couldn't ever make it re-usable, but you'd always make another if you needed to. Though in the many years you've been on the train nothing's happened.

      The first time you are targeted by a mafia night kill, you will survive.

      You win when all Mafia are killed, so your goal is to find them. Play towards your win condition, and good luck.

      Hello, you are The Cop

      Whenever you're doing something with your friends you always bring along a book. Not because the conversations are boring but because the books are so interesting. You're mostly on a non-fiction kick these days. As a result you've become the go-to friend not only for any existing knowledge but for finding out anything. Especially about other people. Evil always leaves a paper trail, and you can follow it like no other.

      Each night you can target any player and will be informed of their alignment: either Town or Mafia.

      You win when all Mafia are killed, so your goal is to find them. Play towards your win condition, and good luck.

      Hello, you are The Tracker

      You've always been eerily quiet, to the point where if somebody isn't looking at you they won't know you're there. And you've gotten pretty good at hiding yourself too. Whenever the occasional new face joins the train you always watch out to see where they're going. However you do get a little bit too focused and wouldn't even notice if someone punched them in the face, so long as they didn't punch back.

      Each night you can target any player and will be informed of who, if anybody, they visit during that night.

      You win when all Mafia are killed, so your goal is to find them. Play towards your win condition, and good luck.

      Hello, you are The Doctor

      You've wanted absolutely nothing more than to be able to protect your friends, and after several years of hard training you've finally been able to do it. You've been able to help the group get through the occasional rough patch, but you can only hope that you're able to help this new group of passengers. You value nothing more than life itself, and even one more day of life extended is a miracle you could never have expected.

      Each night you can target any player and protect them from the mafia night kill.

      You win when all Mafia are killed, so your goal is to find them. Play towards your win condition, and good luck.

      Hello, you are The Mafia Roleblocker

      Luke always told you stories of a time when the train was much more quiet, and after that you've always been trying to restore that ideal. You tried just staying in your room, but not only would people keep dragging you out, it was still loud anyways. So then you tried going outside during the night, but someone always eventually went outside. So you tried to mitigate this by copying the blueprints The Jailkeeper uses for his locks, and while that helped, it was still too loud during the day. So you resolved to get everyone who wouldn't be quiet off the train.

      Your partners devised a communication system so that you can talk with your allies at any time. During the night, you also collectively eliminate one other player from the train.
      Furthermore, you can target any player and prevent them from taking any actions that night.

      You win when all Town are killed, or nothing can prevent this outcome.


      Alive (8)
      1. NDMath++
      2. Scipio1++
      3. mathjay+
      4. Ruegerbyrd
      5. mathlearner2357

      Modlog
      Mar 5, 2022, 18:38 - Denominated OCRSTM 10.0.1 Public Use Clean Version

      Resources
      Mafia Win: 155
      Town Win: 109
      A Beginner's Guide to Being Awesome at Mafia - This MafiaWiki article explains some basic scumhunting techniques and scum strategy.
      AoPS Mafia Forum Rules
      Mafia FAQ - This post has a glossary of commonly used terms and an overview of how the game works.
      Mafia Universe Wiki: Terminology - This is a more comprehensive list of mafia terminology; it includes some terms that are not as commonly used in this forum.
      This forum has posts written by experienced AoPS Mafia players on their methods for playing the game.
      Automatic ISO Code - This post contains code (written by casi and improved by Mathletesv) that will automatically quote all posts by a given player within a given range of posts.

      k Mafia Game 284: Solar System Mafia
      NDMath   1981
      N Jul 31, 2024 by tigeryong
      Welcome to Mafia Game 284: Solar System Mafia

      Important Rules:
      1.6 Do not edit or delete posts
      1.2 Do not post during night
      1.7 Do not post if you are dead or if you are not in the game
      1.4 Do not talk about anything related to this game outside this thread
      1.1 Read all the rules!


      Rules
      [list][*]Rules
      [list]
      [*]1.1: Read the rules. All of them. Read them multiple times if necessary.
      [*]1.2: Do not post at night.
      [*]1.3: You may PM me at any time and ask me anything, such as rule clarification.
      [*]1.4: Do not quote or pretend to quote any PMs from me, especially role PMs.
      [*]1.5: Do not talk about this game outside of this topic to anyone other than the mods in charge, unless I specifically allow you to do so.
      [*]1.6: You may not use any formatting that has an effect of concealing text. This includes color=#FFFFFF, and color=white, a tip tag inside of another tip tag, among others.
      [*]1.7: Do not edit or delete posts you have already submitted; this includes editing right after you post (what goes in the thread stays in the thread). If you for any reason find the need to change your post, post again.
      [*]1.8: If you are not a living participant of the game, do not post anything else about the game anywhere. You may still spectate the game, but you may no longer post in this thread.
      [*]1.9: Do not advocate for breaking the rules.
      [*]1.10: Confirm your participation in the game by making a post stating the important rules that this isn't your first mafia game.[/list]

      [*] Voting/Elimination Procedures
      [list]
      [*] 2.1: Post votes in code or bold tags in the format [code][code]Vote: <insert player here>[/code][/code] or [code]Vote: <insert player here>[/b][/code]
      Spelling and capitalization do not matter, so long as the "Vote:" part is correct (allows votes to be found with Ctrl+f keyboard shortcut).
      [*] 2.2: Votes may not be placed in hide tags.
      [*] 2.3: Improperly made votes will not be counted under any circumstances. It does not matter if it is the end of the game hammer and everyone revealed their roles. Hint: dont reveal your roles and declare victory until I made the official end of the game post.
      [*] 2.4: You may vote for no elimination to occur during a day. Vote this by including in your post Vote: No Elimination or [code]Vote: No Elimination[/code]
      [*] 2.5: You do not have to unvote before making a new vote, although you have the ability to do so. Unvote in the format Vote: Unvote or [code]Vote: Unvote[/code]
      An unvote will undo your previous vote, if any.
      [*] 2.6: Starting Day 2, If at any point in a day more than half of the votes are for a single player, that player will be eliminated. It will then be twilight.
      [*] 2.7: Starting Day 2, If at any point in a day at least half of the votes are for No Elimination, then there will be no elimination. It will then be twilight.
      [*] 2.8: If the deadline is met, no more votes wills be counted even if the mod has not made a post. The player with the plurality of votes will be eliminated. In the event of a tie involving No Elimination, no elimination occurs, otherwise whichever player got their votes first will be eliminated.
      [*] 2.9: During twilight, players may still post. However, no more votes and/or unvotes will be processed.
      [*] 2.10: Once I post a end-of-day scene, the person eliminated (if any) is officially dead. Night then immediately begins. You may not post during night.[/list]

      [*] Activity Expectations
      [list]
      [*] 3.1: Each day will have a deadline of 288 hours (12 days). The moderator may extend the deadline as they see fit.
      [*] 3.2: The night deadline will be 48 hours after night begins.
      [*] 3.3: When the night deadline is met, if the moderator does not receive a night action from either a player or their partner(s) (if you have them), the player will lose the chance to submit an action for that night.
      [*] 3.4: Any night results will be sent after the night deadline.
      [*] 3.5: Night will end at some time after the night deadline when the mod makes the post announcing the end of night.
      [*] 3.6: In this game, players are expected to post at least twice per 24 hours of day phase which they are alive. There are four posts of leniency on this threshold.
      [*] 3.7: If a player does not post in a 48-hour period or falls more than 4 posts behind the threshold, and the player is not in V/LA, they will receive a prod.
      [*] 3.8: If after another 24 hours the reasoning for the prod is not fixed and the player is not in V/LA, the player will be replaced unless the reasoning for the prod is fixed prior to a replacement being found.
      [*] 3.9: If a player is going to be V/LA, they must PM me. The moderator will not prod the player during that time unless the V/LA is too long.[list]


      [*]Etiquette Expectations
      [list]
      [*] 4.1: Do not use inappropriate language or make any personal attacks.
      [*] 4.2: Follow all of the rules.
      [*] 4.3: Be mature.
      [*] 4.4: For a minor rule infraction, players can receive up to two warnings. If a player commits an infraction after they have run out of warnings, or commits a modkill level infraction, they will be modkilled or force replaced. Please do not make me modkill you.[/list]


      [*] Moderators/Co-Moderators
      [list]
      [*] 5.1: I, NDMath am the moderator of Mafia Game 284, and BananaBall00 is the co-moderator.
      [*] 5.2: This brown (#974E03) is my mod color. Do not post in anything too similar. This purple (#A64D79) is BananaBall00's mod color. Do not post in anything too similar.
      [*] 5.3: The moderator may change the rules at any time.
      [*] 5.4: The moderator has the last say in interpreting the rules. [/list]


      [*] Please read all of the rules, procedures, and expectations for this game.[/list]

      Setup
      This game uses the Matrix6 setup, a Semi-Open setup.

      The setup will be created by picking all three roles in a random row or column and adding 1 Mafia Goon and 5 Vanilla Townies. Therefore the six possible setups are as follows
      Setup 1: 1 Town Jailkeeper, 1 Town 1-Shot Buleetproof, 5 Vanilla Townies, 1 Mafia Roleblocker, 1 Mafia Goon
      Setup 2: 1 Town Cop, 6 Vanilla Townies, 2 Mafia Goons
      Setup 3: 1 Town Tracker, 1 Town Doctor, 5 Vanilla Townies, 2 Mafia Goons
      Setup 4: 1 Town Jailkeeper, 6 Vanilla Townies, 2 Mafia Goons
      Setup 5: 1 Town Cop, 1 Town Doctor, 5 Vanilla Townies, 1 Mafia Roleblocker, 1 Mafia Goon
      Setup 6: 1 Town Tracker, 1 Town 1-Shot Bulletproof, 5 Vanilla Townies, 2 Mafia Goons

      After the specific setup is selected, the nine roles will be randomly distributed to players.

      The mafia have a private chat in a private AoPS forum, that they may post in at any time while alive. To understand the roles that could be in this game, you can read the Role PM's and/or ask me questions. None of these roles are permitted to self-target.

      Role PMs
      [quote=Vanilla Townie]Welcome, USERNAME, to mafia game 284. You are a Dwarf Planet (Vanilla Townie). As one of the many smaller planets, you are working towards eliminating any invasive, bigger planets that are against your team. You dream that one day, you and your friends will be able to rule with the good planets in the Milky Way.

      You are a member of the town, the uninformed majority. The goal of the town is to determine and vote out the mafia during the days, winning when both members of the mafia have been eliminated. All members of the town have their voice and their vote, two very important tools to catching the mafia, two townies this game have an additional power they can use each night phase.

      You win when all members of the mafia are dead.[/quote]
      [quote=Town Cop]Welcome, USERNAME, to mafia game 284. You are Saturn (Town Cop). Known as the planet with the most moons, you seem to always receieve news no other planet can recieve.

      You are a member of the town, the uninformed majority. The goal of the town is to determine and vote out the mafia during the days, winning when both members of the mafia have been eliminated. All members of the town have their voice and their vote, two very important tools to catching the mafia, two townies this game have an additional power they can use each night phase.

      As a Cop, each night you may target a player to attempt to learn if they are a member of the mafia. Your result will be Town or Mafia, or 'No Result'.

      You win when all members of the mafia are dead.[/quote]
      [quote=Town Tracker]
      Welcome, USERNAME, to mafia game 284. You are Mercury (Town Tracker). The fastest of all the planets, you are able to keep up with what any of them are doing.

      You are a member of the town, the uninformed majority. The goal of the town is to determine and vote out the mafia during the days, winning when both members of the mafia have been eliminated. All members of the town have their voice and their vote, two very important tools to catching the mafia, two townies this game have an additional power they can use each night phase.

      As a Tracker, each night you may target a player to attempt to learn who they visited that night, if anybody. Your result will be a list of one or more names, or No Action Taken if they did not use any ability. It is not possible for Tracker to receive 'No Result' in this setup.

      You win when all members of the mafia are dead.[/quote]
      [quote=Town Jailkeeper]
      Welcome, USERNAME, to mafia game 284. You are Neptune (Town Jailkeeper). As the farthest planet from the sun, you are able to pull another planet far away from the other planets.

      You are a member of the town, the uninformed majority. The goal of the town is to determine and vote out the mafia during the days, winning when both members of the mafia have been eliminated. All members of the town have their voice and their vote, two very important tools to catching the mafia, two townies this game have an additional power they can use each night phase.

      As a Jailkeeper, each night you may target a player to attempt to both roleblock them and protect them from all kills that night.

      You win when all members of the mafia are dead.
      [/quote]
      [quote=Town 1-Shot Bulletproof]
      Welcome, USERNAME, to mafia game 284. You are Earth (Town 1-Shot Bulletproof). As your inhabitants are advancing in technology, they managed to add a layer around you that can protect you from destruction once.

      You are a member of the town, the uninformed majority. The goal of the town is to determine and vote out the mafia during the days, winning when both members of the mafia have been eliminated. All members of the town have their voice and their vote, two very important tools to catching the mafia, two townies this game have an additional power they can use each night phase.

      As a 1-Shot Bulletproof, the first time you would otherwise die at night, you will instead survive.

      You win when all members of the mafia are dead.
      [/quote]
      [quote=Town Doctor]
      Welcome, USERNAME, to mafia game 284. You are a Jupiter (Town Doctor). As the biggest planet known in the Solar System, you feel the need to protect all of the dwarf planets from being destroyed.

      You are a member of the town, the uninformed majority. The goal of the town is to determine and vote out the mafia during the days, winning when both members of the mafia have been eliminated. All members of the town have their voice and their vote, two very important tools to catching the mafia, two townies this game have an additional power they can use each night phase.

      As a Doctor, each night you may target a player to attempt to protect them from a kill that night.

      You win when all members of the mafia are dead.
      [/quote]

      If there are two mafia goons, both flavors will be used. If there is just one mafia goon, a flavor will be used at random.
      [quote=Mafia Goon; Mars]
      Welcome, USERNAME, to mafia game 284. You are Mars (Mafia Goon). As the 'red planet' it was only natural that you would be converted to the red team. Named after the Roman God of War, you seek to takeover the Milkyway Galaxy one battle at a time.

      You are a member of the mafia, the informed minority. The goal of the mafia is to blend in with town to survive during the days, whilst secretly killing of a townie each night, until the mafia faction makes up half of all living players. You may speak with you partner, USERNAME (Mafia ROLE), [url=]here[/url] anytime while you are alive.

      As the mafia, you have a factional kill, which in this game is mandatory. Each night phase, the mafia must select one member of the mafia to attempt to kill another player of choice.

      You win when the number of living mafia is at least half of the number of living players.[/quote]
      [quote=Mafia Goon; Venus]
      Welcome, USERNAME, to mafia game 284. You are Venus (Mafia Goon). As the hottest of the planets, you feel that you are also the best. So naturally, you now seek to take over the Milkyway Galaxy (with some help).

      You are a member of the mafia, the informed minority. The goal of the mafia is to blend in with town to survive during the days, whilst secretly killing of a townie each night, until the mafia faction makes up half of all living players. You may speak with you partner, USERNAME (Mafia ROLE), [url=]here[/url] anytime while you are alive.

      As the mafia, you have a factional kill, which in this game is mandatory. Each night phase, the mafia must select one member of the mafia to attempt to kill another player of choice.

      You win when the number of living mafia is at least half of the number of living players.
      [/quote]
      [quote=Mafia Roleblocker draft]
      Welcome, USERNAME, to mafia game 284. You are a Uranus (Mafia Roleblocker). As the coldest of the planets, just approaching another planet can be enough to freeze it from its normal actions with the temperature shock.

      You are a member of the mafia, the informed minority. The goal of the mafia is to blend in with town to survive during the days, whilst secretly killing of a townie each night, until the mafia faction makes up half of all living players. You may speak with you partner, USERNAME (Mafia Goon), [url=]here[/url] anytime while you are alive.

      As the mafia, you have a factional kill, which in this game is mandatory. Each night phase, the mafia must select one member of the mafia to attempt to kill another player of choice. As a Roleblocker, each night you may target a player to attempt to prevent their action.

      You win when the number of living mafia is at least half of the number of living players.[/quote]


      Alive (2)
      2. saturnrocket - Mars (Mafia Goon)
      3. duke_of_wedgewood - Earth (Town 1-Shot Bulletproof)

      k Mafia Game 283: Touhou Mafia
      Thornclaw9000   1339
      N Jun 19, 2024 by violetmx12
      Rules
      Credit to fdas/benjaminsz for template. Big thanks to GeneralCobra19 for help with flavor.
      [list]
      [*]General Rules
      [list]
      [*]1.1: Read the rules. All of them. Read them multiple times if necessary.
      [*]1.2: Do not post at night.
      [*]1.3: You may PM me at any time and ask me anything, such as rule clarification.
      [*]1.4: Do not quote or pretend to quote any PMs from me, including role PMs. Do not discuss which roles you submitted for the game or make any hints about what your picks were. Do not refer to private conversations with the moderator in any way unless given permission.
      [*]1.5: Do not talk about this game outside of this topic to anyone other than the mods in charge, unless I specifically allow you to do so.
      [*]1.6: You may not use any formatting that has an effect of concealing text. This includes size=1, hide="", color=#FFFFFF, and color=white, among others. This does not include adding extra spaces.
      [*]1.7: Do not edit or delete posts you have already submitted; this includes editing right after you post (what goes in the thread stays in the thread). If you for any reason find the need to change your post, use EBWOP or EBWON as necessary.
      [*]1.8: If you are not a living participant of the game, do not post anything else about the game anywhere. You may still spectate the game, but you may no longer post in this thread.
      [*]1.9: Do not advocate for breaking the rules.
      [*]1.10: Do not use the colors red (#FF0000), blue (#0000FF), green (#00FF00), pink (#FF00FF), purple (#9A00FF), or anything that appears similar, as these colors are used for modding purposes.
      [/list]

      [*] Voting/Hanging
      [list]
      [*] 2.1: Post votes in code tags in the format [code]Vote: <insert player here>[/code]
      Since AoPS does not distinguish between usernames with different capitalizations, the capitalization of the player name does not matter. A proper vote looks like [code]Vote: Thornclaw9000[/code]
      [*] 2.2: Votes placed in hide tags or quotes will be ignored.
      [*] 2.3: Improperly made votes will not be counted under any circumstances. It does not matter if it is the end of the game hammer and everyone revealed their roles. Hint: dont reveal your roles and declare victory until I made the official end of the game post.
      [*] 2.4: You may vote for no hang to occur during a day. Vote this by including in your post [code]Vote: No Hang[/code]
      [*] 2.5: You do not have to unvote before making a new vote, though it is appreciated if you do so. Unvote in the format [code]Vote: Unvote[/code]
      An unvote will undo your previous vote, if any.
      [*] 2.6: Spell the username of the player you wish to vote for exactly. Do not use nicknames.
      [*] 2.7: If at any point in a day strictly more than 1/2 of the votes, rounded down, are for a single player, that player will be hanged. It will then immediately be twilight.
      [*] 2.8: If at any point in a day greater than 1/2 of the votes are for no hang, then there will be no hang. It will then be twilight.
      [*] 2.9: If the deadline is met and no person is hanged, it will be considered no hang and will proceed to be twilight.
      [*] 2.10: The moment the deadline passes, no more votes will be counted even if the mod has not made a post.
      [*] 2.11: During twilight, players may still post. However, no more votes and/or unvotes will be processed.
      [*] 2.12: Once I post a end-of-day scene, the person hanged (if any) is officially dead. Night then immediately begins. You may not post during night.
      [*] 2.13: Bolded votes are allowed if and only if you have played in a game prior to Mafia Game 165.
      [/list]

      [*] Activity
      [list]
      [*] 3.1: Each day will be 168 hours (7 days). The moderator may extend the deadline for the end of the day at his/her discretion.
      [*] 3.2: The deadlines will follow the official time.
      [*] 3.3: The deadline will occur the very second 168 hours has occurred.
      [*] 3.4: The night deadline will be 48 hours (2 days) after night begins.
      [*] 3.5: When the night deadline is met, if the moderator and co-moderator do not receive a night action from either a player or his/her partner(s) (if you have them), the player will lose the chance to perform an action during that night.
      [*] 3.6: Any night results will be sent after the night deadline
      [*] 3.7: Night will end at some time after the night deadline when the moderator or co-moderator makes the post announcing the end of night.
      [*] 3.8: If a player does not post in a 48-hour period and he/she is not in V/LA, you will receive an in-game prod.
      [*] 3.9: If a player does not post in another 24-hour period after receiving an in-game prod and he/she is not in V/LA, he/she will receive a PM prod.
      [*] 3.10: If a player does not post in another 48-hour period after receiving a PM prod and he/she is not in V/LA, he/she will be replaced, unless you post before the moderator and co-moderator find a replacement.
      [*] 3.11: If a player receives too many PM Prods (~5, depending on case), he/she will be replaced
      [*] 3.12: If a player is going to be V/LA, he/she must post in bold in-thread or PM me. The moderator will not prod the player unless the V/LA is too long.
      [/list]


      [*]Etiquette
      [list]
      [*] 4.1: Do not use inappropriate language.
      [*] 4.2: Do not make any personal attacks.
      [*] 4.3: Follow all of the rules.
      [*] 4.4: Be mature.
      [*] 4.5: For a minor rule infraction, players can receive up to two warnings. If a player commits an infraction after he/she has run out of warnings, or commits a modkill level infraction, he/she will be modkilled or force replaced. Please do not make me modkill you.
      [*] 4.6: Refrain from angleshooting, especially about flavor. (I am very lazy)
      [/list]

      [*] Moderators/Co-Moderators
      [list]
      [*] 5.1: I, Thornclaw9000, am the moderator of Mafia Game.
      [*] 5.2: The not voting section is to be ignored if it contradicts any other part of the votecount.
      [*] 5.3: If an error to the votecount is not pointed out within 5 days, the incorrect votecount will become official.
      [*] 5.4: The moderator may change the rules at any time.
      [*] 5.5: The moderator has the last say in interpreting the rules. [/list]


      [*]Setup
      This game will use the Bastard++ setup. This is a semi-open setup. Please look at the link for more information about the setup, but note that some of the role names may have been altered.
      [list]
      [*] There are 13 players.
      [*] This setup uses a Daystart.
      [*] Rolecops/Stalkers are guaranteed to be sane.
      [*] Doctors prevent one nightkill.
      [*] Nightkills are indistinguishable. There is no difference between a Mafia, Serial Killer, or Vigilante kill.
      [*] Normal hang majority is strictly greater than 1/2 of all living players, Cult win majority is strictly greater than 1/2 of all living players.
      [*] The role modifier "Hated" means that 1 less vote is required for hang majority.
      [*] The role modifier "Loved" is the opposite of "Hated", meaning that one more vote is required for hang majority.
      [*] The role modifier "Bulletproof" prevents 1 night-kill per night.
      [*] The role modifier "Weak" means that if the person targets a mafia for their night-action, they die.
      [*] If the role modifier "1-Shot" is added, depending on what is connected to it allows an ability to be used only once.
      [*] The moderator will not purposefully present incorrect information, and role modifier(s) (if any) will show in Role PMs and on flip. The only exception to this is the Hidden Condemnee role modifier, which will not show in Role PMs, but will show on flip.
      [*] This rule is applicable to only Jester, Survivor, and Mafia Goon. Actual roles may have different flavor names than the examples in the Role PMs tab. Example flavornames are not necessarily used, even if the role has one or two instances in the game. Additionally, there may be multiple instances of the same flavorname for these roles.
      [*] Each player will have a personal Vanilla Townie flavorname and flavor, regardless of actual role.
      [*] If the randomization of the setup results in an impossible setup, then it will be reranded. Examples include but are not limited to "CCCCCCJTSK" (no corresponding result for 6 Cs) and "CJJJSSSSK" (1+3+5+3+1+3 = 16 unique roles which is greater than the number of players in the setup, 13)
      [/list]

      [*]Role PMs
      [quote=Town Rolecop]You are Aya Shameimaru (Town Rolecop). How exciting! You have many ideas for the Bunbunmaru Newspaper - too bad no one treats your newspaper seriously, it's not like you exaggerate or make up anything!

      Each night, you may listen to the wind around a certain player to get their general demeanor.

      You win when all opposing factions are dead.

      Investigation Results
      [list]
      [*] Cult: Cult Leader, Cultist
      [*] Self-Aligned: Jester, Survivor, Condemner, Serial Killer
      [*] Mafia: Mafia Goon, Mafia Roleblocker, Mafia Stalker
      [*] Vanilla Townie: Vanilla Townie, Investigation Immune Serial Killer
      [*] Doctor: Doctor
      [*] Vigilante: Vigilante
      [*] Rolecop: Town Rolecop


      Potential Role Modifiers:
      [list]
      [*] 1-Shot: You can only rolecop once in this game.
      [/list]
      [/quote]

      [quote=Doctor]You are Eirin Yagokoro (Doctor). As the premier doctor of Gensokyo, your duty hasn't changed at all with this incident. Your job might be tough, but you'll try to prevent as many fatalities and injuries as you can until this is all resolved.

      Each night you may protect one player from one nightkill with your incredible medical knowledge.

      You win when all opposing factions are dead.

      Potential Role Modifiers:
      [list]
      [*] 1-Shot: You can only protect once in this game.
      [/list]
      [/quote]

      [quote=1-Shot Vigilante]You are Marisa Kirasame (1-Shot Vigilante). Another incident-ze? Youre pretty sure either you, Reimu, or Sanae will figure it out-ze.

      You do know you have a trump card up your sleeve, in case any of the youkai decide to make any nefarious moves-ze, which is that once per game you may nightkill a player with your Master Spark-ze!

      You win when all opposing factions are dead-ze.
      [/quote]

      [quote=Vanilla Townie]You are <insert touhou character> (Vanilla Townie). <insert flavortext>

      VT Flavornames
      Alice Margatroid
      Byakuren Hijiri
      Kasen Ibaraki

      Reisen Udongein Inaba
      Suika Ibuki
      Sumireko Usami
      Suwako Moriya
      Tenshi Hinanawi
      Youmu Konpaku
      Yuyuko Saigyouji


      You win when all opposing factions are dead.

      Potential Role Modifiers:
      [list]
      [*] Hated: For hang majority calculations, 1 is added to your votecount.
      [*] Loved: For hang majority calculations, 1 is subtracted from your votecount.
      [/list]
      [/quote]

      [quote=Cult Leader]You are Cirno Fumo (Cult Leader). As an ultimate being of chaos, you seek to take over Gensokyo during this tumultuous time.

      Each night you may convert one player to a Fumo (Cultist).

      You win if the number of cult-aligned players alive is strictly greater than the number of other players alive.

      Potential Role Modifiers:
      [list]
      [*] Hated and Weak: For hang majority calculations, 1 is added to your votecount. You also die if you target a member of the Mafia.
      [*] Weak: You die if you target a member of the Mafia.
      [*] Loved: For hang majority calculations, 1 is subtracted from your votecount.
      [/list]
      [/quote]

      [quote=Cultist]You are a Fumo (Cultist). Being a marketable plushie is fine.

      You win if the number of cult-aligned players alive is strictly greater than the number of other players alive.
      [/quote]

      [quote=Jester]You are Kaguya Houraisan (Jester). You're quite curious as to what is in that massive gap and want to investigate! You're bored with your eternal life, so you are completely fine with dying as a result.

      You win if you are hung. Your win condition does not end the game.

      Potential Role Modifiers:
      [list]
      [*] Loved: For hang majority calculations, 1 is subtracted from your votecount.
      [*] 1-Shot Bulletproof: You will survive one nightkill.
      [/list]
      [/quote]

      [quote=Condemner]You are Chen (Condemner). Your master's master is dead. You want the culprit to be held responsible, and you've found some clues and leads that indicate <random player> being Yukari's murderer. Clearly those who think it's the entirety of the Scarlet Devil Mansion are crazy. Justice must be served!

      You win if <random player> is hung while you are alive. Your win condition does not end the game. You will leave the game if <random player> dies in any way while you are alive.
      [/quote]

      [quote=Survivor]You are Reimu Hakurei (Survivor). Yukari is probably pulling one of her shenanigans again, although the spell card rule being gone is slightly concerning. You'll try to hold down the fort and survive until Yukari is satisfied and stops fooling around.

      You win when any faction wins while you are alive.

      Potential Role Modifiers:
      [list]
      [*] Hated: For hang majority calculations, 1 is added to your votecount.
      [/list]
      [/quote]

      [quote=Serial Killer]You are Utsuho Reiuji (Serial Killer). You aren't quite sure what's going on, something about Yukari? You do remember that someone told you to take over Gensokyo... or something like that? Now seems like a perfect time!

      Each night you may kill one player with the power of nuclear fusion.

      You win when you are the sole player alive.

      Potential Role Modifiers:
      [list]
      [*] Hated: For hang majority calculations, 1 is added to your votecount.
      [*] 1-Shot Bulletproof: You will survive one nightkill.
      [*] Investigation Immune: You turn up as Vanilla Townie when investigated.
      [*] Investigation Immune + 1-Shot Bulletproof: You turn up as Vanilla Townie when investigated and you will survive one nightkill.
      [/list]
      [/quote]
      [quote=Mafia Goon]You are Sakuya Izayoi (Mafia Goon). The youkai seem to be blaming your mistress, Remilia, for Yukari's death. As her maid, you're going to protect her as well as everyone else living at the Scarlet Devil Mansion until this incident is solved.

      Your partner(s) is/are <partner(s)>. Each night your faction may kill one player.

      You win when the number of mafia-aligned players alive is equal to or greater than the number of other players alive.
      [/quote]

      [quote=Mafia Roleblocker]You are Remilia Scarlet (Mafia Roleblocker). You're scared... you know you didn't do anything, at least this time. The other youkai seem to want to kill you as well as the other Scarlet Devil Mansion residents... eek!

      Your partner(s) is/are <partner(s)>. Each night your faction may kill one player. Each night you may also roleblock one player by manipulating their fate, making their action (if any) ineffective. You may perform your factional kill at the same time as your roleblock.

      You win when the number of mafia-aligned players alive is equal to or greater than the number of other players alive.

      Potential Role Modifiers:
      [list]
      [*] 1-Shot: You can only roleblock once this game.
      [/list]
      [/quote]

      [quote=Mafia Stalker]You are Patchouli Knowledge (Mafia Stalker). As a shut-in, you only learnt of Yukari's death when the other Scarlet Devil Mansion residents came back in shock. Remilia is asking for your help to protect her, and you obliged.

      Your partner(s) is/are <partner(s)>. Each night your faction may kill one player. Each night you may also stalk one player to get clues about their general identity, and you'll try to look them up in your library. You may perform your factional kill at the same time as your stalk.

      You win when the number of mafia-aligned players alive is equal to or greater than the number of other players alive.

      Investigation Results
      [list]
      [*] Cult: Cult Leader, Cultist
      [*] Self-Aligned: Jester, Survivor, Condemner, Serial Killer
      [*] Mafia: Mafia Goon, Mafia Roleblocker, Mafia Stalker
      [*] Vanilla Townie: Vanilla Townie, Investigation Immune Serial Killer
      [*] Doctor: Doctor
      [*] Vigilante: Vigilante
      [*] Rolecop: Town Rolecop


      Potential Role Modifier:
      [list]
      [*] 1-Shot: You can only investigate once this game.
      [/list]
      [/quote]


      [*]Notable Rules
      [list]
      [*] Hang majority is strictly greater than 1/2 of alive players. Note that this is different than the original setup.
      [*] No hang majority is strictly greater than 1/2 of alive players.
      [*] Town can only win if there are no SKs, no Mafia members, no Cult members, and no Condemners alive.
      [*] Survivor cannot win with SK.
      [*] Both mafia and cult can win regardless of the composition of the other players.
      [*] Jester and Condemner do not end the game if they win. Condemner will leave the game once their condemnee has died in any way.
      [*] Refrain from angleshooting, especially about flavor.
      [*] Note that the Role PMs tab lacks flavor due to laziness. Each player will have a personal Vanilla Townie flavorname and I can create flavor for it if requested. (i am very lazy!) I might end up writing flavor for them anyways throughout the game if I have the time.
      [*] Mafia and Cult have daytime and nighttime access to private factional chats.
      [/list]


      [*]Confirm Rule Quiz
      PM the answers to these question to me to confirm. Refrain from giving the answers away here. You must pass this test with a score of at least 7/8 to pass. If you do not pass, see me after class (I will give you the answers), but you might be publicly shamed. Hint: Just read the notable rules tab for questions 1-4.
      1A/B/C. How many player votes do you need to hang a normal player when there are 13 players alive? What about a hated player? A loved player? (3 points)
      2. How many player votes do you need to no hang when there are 13 players alive? (1 point)
      3A. Can the mafia faction win while the SK or the cult faction is still alive? (1 point)
      3B. Can the cult faction win while the SK or the mafia faction is still alive? (1 point)
      4. Can a Survivor win together with the SK? (1 point)
      5. Can town win together with the mafia faction? If so, how? (1 point)

      [/list]
      Alive (3)

      scannose, Youmu Konpaku (Loved Vanilla Townie)

      Day 5 - Day 5 started at 03:09:00, 1st March 2024. (UTC)
      Thunderdome between awesomeming327. and Fvr_Vain initiated, Post #1247
      End of Game, Town + Condemner + Loved Jester win, Post #1258

      Story
      Warning: I am not good at writing.
      Gensokyo hadn't had an incident in almost a month, when Yukari Yakumo suddenly went missing. While this wouldn't normally be of concern, a massive gap appearing, the Great Hakurei Barrier weakening, and the spell card rules vanishing have led to great concern. The massive gap mysteriously had text spelled out - "Yukari Yakumo". Reimu threw a rock in to investigate, and the text suddenly changed to spell "Rock". The shrine maidens, people, and youkai quickly realized that Yukari is very likely dead, whoever killed Yukari was a threat, and the power balance and lives of Gensokyo may be in danger. Every clue was pointing to the Scarlet Devil Mansion being behind all of this.

      Thornclaw9000 (Yukari Yakumo) is dead. Day 1 begins.

      Hall of Shame
      aayr
      ad333
      Fvr_Vain
      pandabear10

      k Mafia Game 282 (Newbie Game 106): Emoji Mafia
      fdas   550
      N Apr 26, 2024 by fdas
      Welcome to Mafia Game 282: Emoji Mafia

      Important Rules:
      Do not edit or delete posts
      Do not post during night
      Do not post if you are dead or if you are not in the game
      Do not talk about anything related to this game outside this thread
      Read all the rules!


      Rules
      [list][*]Rules
      [list]
      [*]1.1: Read the rules. All of them. Read them multiple times if necessary.
      [*]1.2: Do not post at night.
      [*]1.3: You may PM me at any time and ask me anything, such as rule clarification.
      [*]1.4: Do not talk about this game outside of this topic to anyone other than the mods in charge, unless I specifically allow you to do so.
      [*]1.5: You may not use any formatting that has an effect of concealing text. This includes size=1, hide="", color=#FFFFFF, and color=white, among others. This does not include adding extra spaces.
      [*]1.6: Do not edit or delete posts you have already submitted; this includes editing right after you post (what goes in the thread stays in the thread). If you for any reason find the need to change your post, use EBWOP or EBWON as necessary.
      [*]1.7: If you are not a living participant of the game, do not post anything else about the game anywhere. You may still spectate the game, but you may no longer post in this thread.
      [*]1.8: Do not advocate for breaking the rules.
      [*]1.9: Do not use the colors red (#FF0000), blue (#0000FF), green (#00FF00), or anything that appears similar, as these colors are used for modding purposes.
      [*]1.10: Confirm your participation in the game by making a post stating the important rules[/list]

      [*] Voting/Hanging
      [list]
      [*] 2.1: Post votes in code tags in the format [code][code]Vote: <insert player here>[/code][/code]
      Since AoPS does not distinguish between usernames with different capitalizations, the capitalization of the player name does not matter. A proper vote looks like [code]Vote: fdas[/code]
      [*] 2.2: Votes may not be placed in hide tags.
      [*] 2.3: Improperly made votes will not be counted under any circumstances. It does not matter if it is the end of the game hammer and everyone revealed their roles. Hint: dont reveal your roles and declare victory until I made the official end of the game post.
      [*] 2.4: You may vote for no hang to occur during a day. Vote this by including in your post [code]Vote: No Hang[/code]
      [*] 2.5: You do not have to unvote before making a new vote, though it is appreciated if you do so. Unvote in the format [code]Vote: Unvote[/code]
      An unvote will undo your previous vote, if any.
      [*] 2.6: Spell the username of the player you wish to vote for exactly. Do not use nicknames.
      [*] 2.7: If at any point in a day more than half of the votes are for a single player, that player will be hanged. It will then immediately be twilight.
      [*] 2.8: If at any point in a day at least half of the votes are for no hang, then there will be no hang. It will then be twilight.
      [*] 2.9: If the deadline is met and no person is hanged, it will be considered no hang and will proceed to be twilight.
      [*] 2.10: The moment the deadline passes, no more votes will be counted even if the mod has not made a post.
      [*] 2.11: During twilight, players may still post. However, no more votes and/or unvotes will be processed.
      [*] 2.12: Once I post a end-of-day scene, the person hanged (if any) is officially dead. Night then immediately begins. You may not post during night.[/list]

      [*] Activity
      [list]
      [*] 3.1: Each day will be 336 hours (2 weeks). The moderator may extend the deadline for the end of the day at his/her discretion. Note that this will be unlikely.
      [*] 3.2: The deadlines will follow the official time
      [*] 3.3: The deadline will occur the very second 336 hours has occurred.
      [*] 3.4: The night deadline will be 72 hours after night begins.
      [*] 3.5: When the night deadline is met, if the moderator does not receive a night action from either a player or his/her partner(s) (if you have them), the player will lose the chance to perform an action during that night.
      [*] 3.6: Any night results will be sent after the night deadline
      [*] 3.7: Night will end at some time after the night deadline when the mod makes the post announcing the end of night.
      [*] 3.8: If a player does not post in a 48-hour period and he/she is not in V/LA, you will receive an in-game prod.
      [*] 3.9: If a player does not post in another 24-hour period after receiving an in-game prod and he/she is not in V/LA, he/she will receive a PM prod.
      [*] 3.10: If a player does not post in another 48-hour period after receiving a PM prod and he/she is not in V/LA, he/she will be replaced, unless you post before the moderator finds a replacement.
      [*] 3.11: If a player receives 5 PM Prods, he/she will be replaced
      [*] 3.12: If a player is going to be V/LA, he/she must post in bold in-thread or PM me. The moderator will not prod the player unless the V/LA is too long.[list]


      [*]Etiquette
      [list]
      [*] 4.1: Do not use inappropriate language.
      [*] 4.2: Do not make any personal attacks.
      [*] 4.3: Follow all of the rules.
      [*] 4.4: Be mature.
      [*] 4.5: For a minor rule infraction, players can receive up to two warnings. If a player commits an infraction after he/she has run out of warnings, or commits a modkill level infraction, he/she will be modkilled or force replaced. Please do not make me modkill you.[/list]


      [*] Moderators/Co-Moderators
      [list]
      [*] 5.1: I fdas am the moderator of Mafia Game 282 and candythecorgi is the co mod
      [*] 5.2: Red-colored text (#FF0000) is used for official votecounts and activity checks by the moderators. It is also used for mafia flavor-related posts.
      [*] 5.3: Blue-colored text (#0000FF) is used for the moderator and co-mod's posts other than votecounts and activity checks.
      [*] 5.4: Green-colored text (#00FF00) is used for town flavor-related posts.
      [*] 5.5: The not voting section is to be ignored if it contradicts any other part of the votecount
      [*] 5.6: If an error to the votecount is not pointed out within 5 days, the incorrect votecount will become official.
      [*] 5.7: The moderator may change the rules at any time.
      [*] 5.8: The moderator has the last say in interpreting the rules. [/list]


      [*] Read all of the rules[/list]

      Setup
      This game will use the Matrix6 setup. This is a semi-open setup.

      In this setup, there are 9 players. Three of the roles will be generated randomly by picking a row or column from the matrix. Then one Mafia Goon and 5 Vanilla Townies are added to maintain a 2:7 mafia:town ratio. The six possible setups are:
      1. 5 Vanilla Townies, 1 Town Jailkeeper, 1 1-Shot Bulletproof Townie, 1 Mafia Roleblocker, 1 Mafia Goon
      2. 6 Vanilla Townies, 1 Town Cop, 2 Mafia Goons
      3. 5 Vanilla Townies, 1 Town Doctor, 1 Town Tracker, 2 Mafia Goons
      4. 6 Vanilla Townies, 1 Town Jailkeeper, 2 Mafia Goons
      5. 5 Vanilla Townies, 1 Town Cop, 1 Town Doctor, 1 Mafia Goon, 1 Mafia Roleblocker
      6. 5 Vanilla Townies, 1 1-Shot Bulletproof Townie, 1 Town Tracker, 2 Mafia Goons


      Role PMs
      [quote]You are a :maybe: (Vanilla Townie). You have no other power other than your vote.

      You win when all of the evil emojis (Mafia) are dead.[/quote]

      [quote]You are a :police: (Cop). Every night, you may target one person and determine their alignment.

      You win when all of the evil emojis (Mafia) are dead.[/quote]

      [quote]You are a :stretcher: (Doctor). Every night you may heal someone, allowing them to survive if they would have otherwise died. You may not heal yourself two nights in a row.

      You win when all of the evil emojis (Mafia) are dead.[/quote]

      [quote]You are a :ninja: (Tracker). Every night you may sneakily follow someone and learn who they visited.

      You win when all of the evil emojis (Mafia) are dead.[/quote]

      [quote]You are a :play_ball: (Jailkeeper). Each night you may choose someone to put in jail. That person will be unable to perform any actions that night and night kills attempting to target that person will be blocked.

      You win when all of the evil emojis (Mafia) are dead.[/quote]

      [quote]You are a :showoff: (1-Shot Bulletproof Townie). On the first time that you are attacked by the Mafia, that kill will be negated.

      You win when all of the evil emojis (Mafia) are dead.[/quote]

      [quote]You are a :diablo: (Mafia Goon). During the night you may talk with your partner () here to discuss who you want to kill.

      You win when all of the good emojis (Town) are dead.[/quote]

      [quote]You are a :censored: (Mafia Roleblocker). During the night you may talk with your partner () here to discuss who you want to kill. You may also target someone and that person will be unable to perform any actions that night. Your ability takes precedence over the jailkeeper.

      You win when all of the good emojis (Town) are dead.[/quote]
