      k Mafia Game 281: Duolingo Mafia
      DXtreme   8655
      N Apr 26, 2024 by fdas
      [rule]
      [center]Mafia Game 281
      Duolingo Mafia[/center]
      [rule]
      It's 12:02 AM. You are exhausted from an incredibly busy day and are ready to zone out for the night. While scrolling through your notification center before you sleep, you pass by a green, smiling face of an owl.

      Your finger stops scrolling. Your heart skips a beat. You slowly scroll back up, heart now pounding, fingers shaking. There it is. The message you've been dreading for decades.

      It looks like you haven't done your lesson yet. You know what that means!
      [rule]

      - Important Rules -
      This tab summarizes the most important rules for easy reference.

      For experienced players: Everything you need is here, and in the setup tab.
      For new players: You may find it useful to familiarize yourself with the rest of the rules.

      Integrity
      [list][*]Do not edit or delete your posts, even for typos. Just post again.
      [*]Do not OOT (Out of Thread) and talk about this game outside this thread, your role PM, or approved private chats, even if you are dead. Access to spectator chats will be granted upon request.
      [*]Do not gamethrow or intentionally sabotage your wincondition.
      [*]Do not attach files or link to external documents concerning this game. Discussions must stay in this thread.
      [*]Do not use OGI (Out of Game Information). Publicly discussed reads should be made exclusively from information in this thread or past completed games.[/list]

      Activity
      [list][*]Each "Day" is 10 days while each "Night" is 3 days.
      [*]Do not post during night.
      [*]This game uses Dawn Start: Day 1 will not start until everyone shows that they have read the rules by completing the confirm task.
      [*]All times will be in Eastern Standard Time (EST, UTC-5) or Eastern Daylight Time (EDT, UTC-4) as applicable.
      [*]Activity rules are 48 hours to in-game prod, 72 hours to PM prod, and 96 hours to replacement status.[/list]

      Voting
      [list][*]You must format your votes correctly. Capitalization does not matter, and capital i/lowercase L are not differentiated.
      [*]Both bold vote and code vote formats are accepted, although bold is preferred. Refer to the Voting tab if you do not know what these are.[/list]

      Etiquette and Warnings

      [list][*]Use common sense.
      [*]Do not use formatting that makes text hard to read.
      [*]You may attack a players opinion, but do not make personal attacks on players themselves.
      [*]Disagreements should be resolved in a way that does not affect gameplay.
      [*]Do not discuss rule violations by other players in the thread; contact the moderators privately.
      [*]All players can receive up to a maximum of 3 warnings. Their next offence will result in a mod-kill.
      [*]Players may be replaced at the moderators' discretion for procedural difficulties.
      [*]All other rules are standard.[/list]

      Setup and Moderators

      [list][*]This game is based on the Matrix 14 setup.
      [*]Mafia have access to daychat.
      [*]This game is moderated by DXtreme and awesomeming327..[/list]

      Resources and Support

      [list] [*]For a list of basic resources, refer to the Resources tab below.
      [*]For a more extensive list of resources compiled by the UIMT, go here.
      [*]If this game is causing you significant stress or frustration, feel free to use your role PM to talk or vent. We may not be allowed to give you technical advice, but we can listen or help you find a better way to process events.[/list]

      Confirm that you have read these rules by posting something nice about the Duolingo Bird in your Role PM.


      [list][*]General
      Credits to Binomial-theorem, chaotic_iak, willwang123, and fdas, among others, as well as the Mafia Universe Forum Rules, for the general rule template.

      The following are standard mafia game rules.


      [list][*]Do not post during the night phase.
      [*]Do not talk about this game's events outside of this thread unless you are specifically given permission to do so by the moderators. Details are in the Moderation Policies tab.
      [*]Do not talk about other ongoing games in this thread. Referring to anything that has happened in an ongoing game, even if you do not say which game it is, is OOT.
      [*]If you are dead, do not post, and do not talk about this game anywhere else. You may still spectate; access to spoiled and unspoiled spectator chats will be offered.
      [*]Do not use any formatting that obscures or conceals text. This includes [color=#FFFFFF], [color=white], and [color=transparent].
      [*]Do not edit or delete posts, even for typos: what goes in the thread stays in the thread. Instead, use EBWOP or EBWON as appropriate.
      [*]Do not quote/screenshot or pretend to quote any PMs from the mods, including role PMs.
      [*]Do not impersonate the mods.
      [*]Do not lie to the mods.
      [*]Do not abuse loopholes in the rules. Intent will be considered during rule enforcement.
      [*]It is suggested to use your role PM to ask questions, such as rule clarifications.[/list]


      [*]Votes and Hangs
      This tab covers voting, unvoting, No Hangs, and hangs.


      [list][*]Votes must be in this format to be counted: Vote: [player username].
      [*]By default, votes should be made in [b] (bold) tags. However, votes made in [code] and [c] tags will also be accepted.
      [*]Usernames in votes must be spelled, but not necessarily capitalized, correctly. Do not use nicknames.
      [*]For the purposes of voting, I (capital i) and l (lowercase L) are considered identical.
      [*]For example, both Vote: DXtreme and Vote: dXtReMe are valid votes, but vote: DXtreme, Vote: Dx, Vote: DXtreme., Vote:DXtreme, Vote: DXtreme, and Vote: DXtreme are invalid.
      [*]Votes followed by extraneous punctuation that is similarly formatted, even with separate tags, are invalid.
      [*]Votes in hide, tip, or quote tags do not count.
      [*]Vote to hang no one by posting Vote: No Hang.
      [*]Unvote by posting Unvote. You do not have to unvote before voting again.
      [*]Votecounts (VCs) will be posted periodically. Players may request a new VC anytime in bold or in their role PM.
      [*]Invalid votes will not count under any circumstances.
      [*]Valid votes will always be counted unless they are clearly unintentional. There is no guarantee that an accidental vote will not be counted.
      [*]Votes will be carried over if a player is replaced.
      [*]The Not Voting section should be ignored if it contradicts another part of the votecount (VC).
      [*]If an error in the votecount is not pointed out within 2 days or by the next EOD, whichever is sooner, the incorrect VC will become official.
      [*]If two or more players have the same number of votes at the EOD deadline, the player who reached that number of votes first will be hanged. Details are in the Moderation Policies tab.
      [*]If no votes have been cast by the deadline, no one will be hanged.
      [*]The moment the deadline occurs, no further votes will be counted. Details are in the Moderation Policies tab.
      [*]If the deadline has passed or a hammer has occurred and the EOD has not been declared, the game will proceed into twilight. Players may still post, but no more votes or unvotes will be counted.
      [*]Once the moderators declare the EOD, the person hanged will be officially eliminated and their role revealed. Night will then immediately begin.[/list]

      [*]Activity
      This tab covers deadlines, activity rules, V/LAs, and replacements.


      [list][*]All times will be in Eastern Standard Time (EST, UTC-5) or Eastern Daylight Time (EDT, UTC-4) as applicable, unless otherwise noted.
      [*]Each day phase will be 240 hours (10 days), and each night phase will be 72 hours (3 days).
      [*]The moderators may extend deadlines at their discretion.
      [*]The current deadline can always be found in the bottom of the OP (Original Post, or Post #1).
      [*]If a player with an NA (Night Action) anticipates being unavailable during the night phase, they may submit any night actions to be performed in advance.
      [*]If a player with an NA has not submitted their action by 24 hours before the night deadline, a reminder will be sent.
      [*]If the moderators do not receive an NA submission from a player by the night deadline, the player will not perform an action that night.
      [*]Night results will be sent after the night deadline.
      [*]Night will end when the moderators make a post declaring the end of night (EON). You may not post in the thread until then, even if the night deadline has passed. Instead, PM the mods for updates if they miss a deadline.
      [*]Players who are temporarily unable to fulfill activity requirements can declare a V/LA (Vacation/Long Absence) by posting the V/LA dates in bold in-thread or in their role PM. Players on a V/LA will not be prodded.
      [*]V/LAs should be shorter than one week. For longer absences, contact the moderators for options.
      [*]If a player needs to go on V/LA more than once, they will be replaced.
      [*]Players who no longer wish to or are unable to play in this game can request replacement by posting Request Replacement in-thread or in their role PM.
      [*]Players who have replaced out generally will not be allowed to replace back in.
      [*]Players will receive an in-game prod if they have not made a game-advancing post for 48 hours and are not on V/LA. Details on "game-advancing post" are in the Moderation Policies tab.
      [*]Players will receive a PM prod if they have not made a game-advancing post for 72 hours and are not on V/LA.
      [*]Players will be replaced if they have not made a game-advancing post for 96 hours and are not on V/LA, unless they post before the moderators find a replacement.
      [*]If a player receives a total of 2 PM Prods, they will be replaced.
      [*]If a player reaches replacement status more than once, they will be replaced.
      [*]Activity Checks (ACs) will be posted periodically. Players may request a new AC in bold or in their role PM.
      [*]Activity will reset overnight. Players will not receive prods between twilight and daystart.
      [*]If a player is postbanned for an overly long time by the AoPS Sheriff, they will be replaced. Details are in the Moderation Policies tab.[list]

      [*]Integrity and Etiquette
      This tab covers integrity recommendations, player etiquette, warning limits, and examples of inconsiderate gameplay.


      [list][*]Do not gamethrow.
      [*]Do not discuss player alignments based on V/LAs, replacements, warnings, force replacements, modkills, or other interactions with moderators.
      [*]Do not discuss rule violations, especially violations by other players in the thread. If you wish, contact the moderators privately through your role PM.
      [*]Any significant, game-related, and intentionally exclusive player-to-player communication outside of moderator-sanctioned channels is prohibited.
      [*]Do not publicly reference OGI (Out of Game Information) in reads or create situations outside the thread that players could reasonably consider alignment indicative.[/list]

      The above rules are attempts to preserve the spirit of the game and should not affect most players. For specific details and examples, click here.


      [list][*]Do not make personal attacks. You may attack a player's opinion, but do not demean the player themselves.
      [*]Do not spam.
      [*]Follow AoPS Community Guidelines and the AoPS Terms of Service.
      [*]Be mature and use common sense.
      [*]Behavior that disrupts the game for players and makes it unreasonably hard for them to read and play may result in a warning.
      Causing significant disruptions to gameplay may result in a force replacement at the moderators' discretion.
      [*]For minor rule infractions, first-timers can receive up to three warnings, while all other players can receive up to two. A player may receive multiple warnings for a single infraction.[/list]

      The above rules broadly address most etiquette issues. For specific details and examples of improper behavior, click here.


      [*]- Moderation Policies -

      [*]Moderator Information
      This tab provides technical information about this game.


      [list][*]DXtreme and awesomeming327. are the moderators of Mafia Game 281.
      [*]DXtreme's moderation color is #0c0. These are the colors which will be used for votecounts, and other posts relating specifically to the particular moderator.
      [*]awesomeming327.'s moderation color is #A64D79. These are the colors which will be used for votecounts, and other posts relating specifically to the particular moderator.
      [*]Blue (#005dff) will be used for Activity Checks, confirm counts, and other non-essential posts by the moderators.
      [*]Green (#2be368) will be used for town flavor-related text.
      [*]Red (#f00) will be used for mafia flavor-related text.
      Purple (#9a00ff) will be used for third-party-related text.
      [*]The moderators may change the rules at any time.
      [*]The moderators pledge to treat players fairly and keep moderator interventions to a minimum; however, we reserve the right to make the final judgement in the moderation of this game.[/list]
      [rule]
      The Mafia Game 281 OP is based on Overcomplicated RulesetTM (OCRSTM) 10.
      Current Version: 10.0.1
      Version History
      [/list]
      Setup
      This game will use the Matrix14 setup. This is a semi-open setup.

      In this setup, there are 13 players. Six of the roles will be generated randomly by picking a row, column, or diagonal from the matrix. Then one Mafia Goon and 6 Vanilla Townies are added.

      Original Matrix:

      IMAGE

      For a better visual, here are the fourteen possible setups:

      [list=1]
      [*]1 Werewolf Goon, 1 Werewolf JOAT, 1 Mafia Goon, 1 Mafia JOAT, 1 Town Doctor, 1 Town Even-Night Tracker, 1 Town 2-Shot Commuter, 6 Vanilla Townies (9:2:2)
      [*]1 Mafia Goon, 1 Mafia Roleblocker, 1 Serial Killer, 1 Town Odd-Night Watcher, 1 Town Bodyguard, 8 Vanilla Townies (10:2:1)
      [*]1 Mafia Rolecop, 2 Mafia Goons, 1 Town Jailkeeper, 1 Town 1-Shot Vigilante, 1 Town Neighbourizer, 7 Vanilla Townies (10:3)
      [*]1 Mafia Godfather, 2 Mafia Goons, 1 Town Jailkeeper, 2 Town 1-Shot Cops, 7 Vanilla Townies (10:3)
      [*]1 Mafia JOAT, 1 Mafia Roleblocker, 1 Mafia Goon, 1 Town Fruit Vendor, 1 Town Watcher, 1 Town Cop, 7 Vanilla Townies (10:3)
      [*]1 Mafia Rolecop, 1 Mafia 2-Shot Strongman, 1 Mafia Goon, 1 Town Tracker, 1 Town Universal Backup, 1 Town Doctor, 7 Vanilla Townies (10:3)
      [*]1 Mafia JOAT, 2 Mafia Goons, 1 Serial Killer, 1 Town Bodyguard, 1 Town Jailkeeper, 1 Town Tracker, 6 Vanilla Townies (9:3:1)
      [*]1 Mafia JOAT, 2 Mafia Goons, 1 Town Jailkeeper, 1 Town Tracker, 8 Vanilla townies (10:3)
      [*]1 Mafia JOAT, 1 Mafia Rolecop, 1 Mafia Goon, 1 Town Doctor, 1 Town Odd-Night Watcher, 1 Town 1-Shot Vigilante, 1 Town 1-Shot Cop, 6 Vanilla Townies (10:3)
      [*]1 Mafia Rolecop, 1 Mafia 2-Shot Strongman, 1 Mafia Goon, 1 Town Jailkeeper, 1 Town Even-Night Tracker, 1 Town Fruit Vendor, 7 Vanilla Townies (10:3)
      [*]1 Mafia Roleblocker, 2 Mafia Goons, 1 Town 2-Shot Commuter, 1 Town Watcher, 1 Town Universal Backup, 7 Vanilla Townies (10:3)
      [*]1 Mafia Godfather, 1 Mafia Goon, 1 Serial Killer, 1 Town Bodyguard, 1 Town Cop, 8 Vanilla Townies (10:2:1)
      [*]1 Mafia Roleblocker, 1 Mafia Goon, 1 Werewolf JOAT, 1 Werewolf Goon, 1 Town Neighbourizer, 1 Town 1-Shot Cop, 1 Town Doctor, 6 Vanilla Townies (9:2:2)
      [*]1 Mafia JOAT, 1 Mafia Rolecop, 1 Mafia Goon, 1 Town Odd-Night Watcher, 1 Town Cop, 1 Town Doctor, 7 Vanilla Townies (10:3)
      [/list]

      Role PMs
      The important information within each Role PM will be in bold. Although it is suggested that you read the entire PM, you only need to read the bolded parts to get an understanding of your role's abilities. You can also learn more about each character here if you're bored, since they're real characters from the app!

      Town
      [quote=Vanilla Townie]You are Duolingo User (Vanilla Townie).

      Duo has caught you in his trap and you now are forced to complete your lessons daily. You must save time for this lesson, otherwise your safety is no longer guaranteed.

      You have no special abilities besides your vote and your voice.

      You win if all threats to the town are eliminated and at least one town-aligned player is alive. The game thread is here <link>.[/quote]
      [quote=Town Cop]You are Officer Lucy (Town Cop).

      As one of Duo's so-called "friends", Duo makes sure you assist him always. However, you are not on his side and are working with the other trapped users to take him down. Each night, you can hack into a user's device, and discover who they work with.

      During each night, you may select a player to be inspected, and discover their alignment. At the end of the night, you will know if they are [Guilty] or [Not Guilty]. If your action fails for any reason, you will receive [No Result].

      You win if all threats to the town are eliminated and at least one town-aligned player is alive. The game thread is here <link>.[/quote]
      [quote=Town 1-Shot Cop]You are Rookie Officer Lucy (Town 1-Shot Cop).

      As a younger version of the original Lucy and one of Duo's so-called "friends", Duo makes sure you assist him always. However, you are not on his side and are working with the other trapped users to take him down. During any one night of your choice, you can figure out how to hack into a user's device and discover who they work with.

      During any one night of your choice, you may select a player to inspect and discover their alignment. At the end of the night, you will know if they are [Guilty] or [Not Guilty]. If your action fails for any reason, you will receive [No Result].

      You win if all threats to the town are eliminated and at least one town-aligned player is alive. The game thread is here <link>.[/quote]
      [quote=Town Tracker]You are Lily the Stalker (Town Tracker).

      You are an even lazier version of the original Lily and one of Duo's so-called "friends". But truthfully, you are a servant to Duo. Though you have really had no care about anything at all, you know that you are not on Duo's side and are working with the other trapped users to take him down. Every night, you can stalk another's account and discover the other users they contacted.

      Each night, you may select a player to track and discover who they visited. At the end of the night, you will receive a message containing [Name(s)] or [None]. If your action fails for any reason, you will receive [No Result].

      You win if all threats to the town are eliminated and at least one town-aligned player is alive. The game thread is here <link>.[/quote]
      [quote=Town Even-Night Tracker]You are Lily the Lazy Stalker (Town Even-Night Tracker).

      You are one of Duo's so-called "friends", but truthfully a servant to him. You really have no care about anything at all. However, you know that you are not on his side and are working with the other trapped users to take him down. Every other (even) night, you can stalk another's account and discover the other users they contacted.

      Every even night, you may select a player to track and discover who they visited. At the end of the night, you will receive a message containing [Name(s)] or [None]. If your action fails for any reason, you will receive [No Result].

      You win if all threats to the town are eliminated and at least one town-aligned player is alive. The game thread is here <link>.[/quote]
      [quote=Town Watcher]You are Observant Lin (Town Watcher).

      As both the granddaughter of Officer Lucy and one of Duo's so-called "friends", you are a servant to Duo and are forced to assist him publicly always. You are not on his side and are working with the other trapped users to take him down. Each night, you can watch one user's account and see which other players contact the person you choose to watch.

      Each night, you may select a player to be watched, thus discovering who visited the targeted player during the same night. At the end of the night, you will receive a message containing [Name(s)] or [None]. If your action fails for any reason, you will receive [No Result].

      You win if all threats to the town are eliminated and at least one town-aligned player is alive. The game thread is here <link>.[/quote]
      [quote=Town Odd-Night Watcher]You are Sometimes Observant Lin (Town Odd-Night Watcher).

      As both another version of the original granddaughter of Officer Lucy and one of Duo's so-called "friends", you are a servant to Duo and are forced to assist him publicly always. You are not on his side and are working with the other trapped users to take him down. Every odd night, you can watch a user's account and see which other players contacted the person you had chosen to watch.

      Every odd night, you may select a player to be watched, thus discovering who visited the targeted player during that night. At the end of the night, you will receive a message containing [Name(s)] or [None]. If your action fails for any reason, you will receive [No Result].

      You win if all threats to the town are eliminated and at least one town-aligned player is alive. The game thread is here <link>.[/quote]
      [quote=Town Doctor]You are Doctor Vikram (Town Doctor).

      You are an innocent doctor who cares for the users of Duolingo, and are always trying to protect them from the evilness of Duo, your so-called "friend". You are not on Duo's side and are working with the other trapped users to take him down. Each night, you can give a one-night Streak Freeze to a user and protect them from losing their streak.

      Each night, you may select a player to be protected. This will protect them from one kill for one night. The targeted player is not informed that they were protected. You will not be informed if you protected the player from a kill. You cannot target yourself.

      You win if all threats to the town are eliminated and at least one town-aligned player is alive. The game thread is here <link>.[/quote]
      [quote=Town Bodyguard]You are Guardian Eddy (Town Bodyguard).

      You are a bodyguard who will save the users of Duolingo instead of yourself. Though Duo is your so-called "friend", you are not on Duo's side and are working with the other trapped users to take him down. Each night, you must give up your Streak Freeze to another player.

      Each night, you may select a player. If the targeted player is supposed to get killed, you will die instead of your target. If your target is receiving two shots during the same night, both of you and your target dies. The targeted player is not informed that they were protected. You will not be informed if you protected the player from a kill.

      You win if all threats to the town are eliminated and at least one town-aligned player is alive. The game thread is here <link>.[/quote]
      [quote=Town Jailkeeper]You are Warden Oscar (Town Jailkeeper).

      You are a warden who will watch over the users of Duolingo. Though Duo is your so-called "friend", you are not on Duo's side and are working with the other trapped users to take him down. Each night, you can temporarily delete Duolingo for a user and stop them from losing their streak or contacting anyone else.

      Each night, you may select a player who will be protected from one kill during that night. Your target will also be unable to perform any (active) night action during the same night. You will not be informed whether you protected the player from a kill or about the (possible) night actions your target was to perform.

      You win if all threats to the town are eliminated and at least one town-aligned player is alive. The game thread is here <link>.[/quote]
      [quote=Town 1-Shot Vigilante]You are Vigilante Junior (Town 1-Shot Vigilante).

      You are the son of Eddy and the so-called "friend" of Duo. However, you are not on Duo's side and are working with the other trapped users to take him down. On one night of your choice, you can kill a Duolingo user.

      At one night of your choice, you may target a player to kill.

      You win if all threats to the town are eliminated and at least one town-aligned player is alive. The game thread is here <link>.[/quote]
      [quote=Town Universal Backup]You are Assistant Falstaff (Town Universal Backup).

      You are well...a bear. You are the last resort of the Duolingo users and are there if they need it. You are also one of Duo's so-called "friends". However, you are not on Duo's side and are working with the other trapped users to take him down.

      You will get the abilities of the first Power Role who dies in the game.

      You win if all threats to the town are eliminated and at least one town-aligned player is alive. The game thread is here <link>.[/quote]
      [quote=Town Neighborizer]You are Zari (Town Neighborizer).

      You are a talkative person who considers just about everyone as a friend! Except one: Duo. You are under his trap and cannot escape alone. You are working with the other trapped users to take him down.

      Each night, you can select a player to recruit into your neighborhood. Players who are in the neighborhood have access to a thread, where they can discuss with each other at any time.

      You win if all threats to the town are eliminated and at least one town-aligned player is alive. The game thread is here <link>.[/quote]
      [quote=Town 2-Shot Commuter]You are Switch-Off Bea (Town 2-Shot Commuter).

      You are under the trap of Duo and publicly seen as his friend. This is not true. You are working with the other trapped users to take him down. You know how to temporarily delete the Duolingo app for yourself, but it only works sometimes.

      At two nights of your choice, you may attempt to "commute". This will make you immune to all actions on that night.

      You win if all threats to the town are eliminated and at least one town-aligned player is alive. The game thread is here <link>.[/quote]
      [quote=Town Fruit Vendor]You are Innocent Junior (Town Fruit Vendor).

      You are the other version of the other Junior, who is a vigilante. You are also under the trap of Duo and publicly seen as his friend. This is not true. You are working with the other trapped users to take him down. You can send small emojis to users for fun!

      Each night, you may select a player in the game and send them a piece of fruit. The fruit itself does nothing. Your targets will know that they have received a fruit but will not get informed about the sender of the fruit.

      You win if all threats to the town are eliminated and at least one town-aligned player is alive. The game thread is here <link>.[/quote]

      Mafia
      [quote=(Setups 2 & 12) Mafia Goon]You are Duo (Mafia Goon). Your mafia team member(s) are <Name(s)>.

      As the main character in your world of Duolingo, your goal is to get every single person in the world to use your app. However, you know that all your servants are against you, and you will need to work with the other versions of yourself to win this war.

      You have a thread that you share with your fellow mafia member(s), which you may use at any time. You also have a factional night kill. Each night, one of you may select a player to kill.

      You win if at least one member of your group is alive and all other players are dead, or if nothing can prevent the same. The game thread is here <link>.[/quote]
      [quote=(Every Other Setup) Mafia Goon]You are Duo (Mafia Goon). Your mafia team members are <Name(s)>.

      As the main character in your world of Duolingo, your goal is to get every single person in the world to use your app, and to make them lose their streaks so you can have full control over them. However, you know that all your servants are against you, and you will need to work with the other versions of yourself to win this war.

      You have a thread that you share with your fellow mafia member(s), which you may use at pre-game or night. You also have a factional night kill. Each night, one of you may select a player to kill.

      You win if at least one member of your group is alive and all other players are dead, or if nothing can prevent the same. The game thread is here <link>.[/quote]
      [quote=Mafia Role Cop]You are Inspector Duo (Mafia Role Cop). Your mafia team members are <Name(s)>.

      As the main character in your world of Duolingo, your goal is to get every single person in the world to use your app, and to make them lose their streaks so you can have full control over them. However, you know that all your servants are against you, and you will need to work with the other versions of yourself to win this war.

      You have a thread that you share with your fellow mafia member(s), which you may use at pre-game or night. You also have a factional night kill. Each night, one of you may select a player to kill. Once per night, you may target a player to be inspected, and discover the name of their role. You will receive a message containing [No Result] if your action fails for any reason.

      You win if at least one member of your group is alive and all other players are dead, or if nothing can prevent the same. The game thread is here <link>.[/quote]
      [quote=Mafia Roleblocker]You are Hacker Duo (Mafia Roleblocker). Your mafia team members are <Name(s)>.

      As the main character in your world of Duolingo, your goal is to get every single person in the world to use your app, and to make them lose their streaks so you can have full control over them. However, you know that all your servants are against you, and you will need to work with the other versions of yourself to win this war.

      You have a thread that you share with your fellow mafia member(s), which you may use at this time.
      Setup 2: Anytime
      Other Setups: Pre-Game or Night
      You also have a factional night kill. Each night, one of you may select a player to kill. Once per night, you may select a player and block all of their role traits for the current night phase.

      You win if at least one member of your group is alive and all other players are dead, or if nothing can prevent the same. The game thread is here <link>.[/quote]
      [quote=Mafia 2-Shot Strongman]You are Indestructible Duo (Mafia 2-Shot Strongman). Your mafia team members are <Name(s)>.

      As the main character in your world of Duolingo, your goal is to get every single person in the world to use your app, and to make them lose their streaks so you can have full control over them. However, you know that all your servants are against you, and you will need to work with the other versions of yourself to win this war.

      You have a thread that you share with your fellow mafia member(s), which you may use at pre-game or night. You also have a factional night kill. At two nights of your choice if you take the factional kill, it cannot be prevented by any kind of protection or jailing. You must announce the usage of your Strongman ability alongside with the kill.


      You win if at least one member of your group is alive and all other players are dead, or if nothing can prevent the same. The game thread is here <link>.[/quote]
      [quote=Mafia Godfather]You are Seemingly Innocent Duo (Mafia Godfather). Your mafia team members are <Name(s)>.

      As the main character in your world of Duolingo, your goal is to get every single person in the world to use your app, and to make them lose their streaks so you can have full control over them. However, you know that all your servants are against you, and you will need to work with the other versions of yourself to win this war.

      You have a thread that you share with your fellow mafia member(s), which you may use at this time.
      Setup 12: Anytime
      Other Setups: Pre-Game or Night
      You also have a factional night kill. Each night, one of you may select a player to kill. Your role enables you to show up as [Not Guilty] on any inspections performed by a Cop.

      You win if at least one member of your group is alive and all other players are dead, or if nothing can prevent the same. The game thread is here <link>.[/quote]
      [quote=Mafia JOAT]You are Duo of All Trades (Mafia JOAT). Your mafia team members are <Name(s)>.

      As the main character in your world of Duolingo, your goal is to get every single person in the world to use your app, and to make them lose their streaks so you can have full control over them. However, you know that all your servants are against you, and you will need to work with the other versions of yourself to win this war.

      You have a thread that you share with your fellow mafia member(s), which you may use at pre-game or night. You also have a factional night kill. In addition, you have the below abilities.
      [list][*]Roleblock: At one night of your choice, you can roleblock a player. They will be unable to perform any (active) night actions during that night.
      [*]Strongman: At one night of your choice if you take the factional kill, it cannot be prevented by any kind of protection or jailing.
      [*]Ninja: At one night of your choice if you perform the factional kill, it will bypass Trackers and Watchers.[/list]
      When using each ability, you must announce which ability you are using alongside your kill. You also cannot use more than one of your abilities in the same night.

      You win if at least one member of your group is alive and all other players are dead, or if nothing can prevent the same. The game thread is here <link>.[/quote]

      Werewolf
      [quote=Werewolf Goon]You are Multi-Dimensional Duo (Werewolf Goon). Your werewolf partner is <Name>.

      You are Duo from an alternate dimension, who was outcasted by the other Duo. You are not the main character in the world of Duolingo, and you and the other outcast want Duo and all the users of his app taken down.

      You have a thread that you share with your fellow werewolf partner, which you may use at pre-game or night. You also have a factional night kill. Each night, one of you may select a player to kill.

      You win if at least one member of your group is alive and all other players are dead, or if nothing can prevent the same. The game thread is here <link>.[/quote]
      [quote=Werewolf JOAT]You are Multi-Dimensional Duo of All Trades (Werewolf JOAT). Your werewolf partner is <Name>.

      You are Duo from an alternate dimension, who was outcasted by the other Duo. You are not the main character in the world of Duolingo, and you and the other outcast want Duo and all the users of his app taken down.

      You have a thread that you share with your fellow werewolf partner, which you may use at pre-game or night. You also have a factional night kill. Each night, one of you may select a player to kill. In addition, you have the below abilities.
      [list][*]Roleblock: At one night of your choice, you can roleblock a player. They will be unable to perform any (active) night actions during that night.
      [*]Strongman: At one night of your choice if you take the factional kill, it cannot be prevented by any kind of protection or jailing.
      [*]Ninja: At one night of your choice if you perform the factional kill, it will bypass Trackers and Watchers.[/list]
      When using each ability, you must announce which ability you are using alongside your kill. You also cannot use more than one of your abilities in the same night.

      You win if at least one member of your group is alive and all other players are dead, or if nothing can prevent the same. The game thread is here <link>.[/quote]

      Serial Killer
      [quote=Serial Killer]You are Assassin Duo (Serial Killer).

      As a hated Duo who also hates everything, your goal is to take down Duolingo and all of the app's users. You will try to survive the original Duo's trap for as long as you can.

      Once per night, you may target a player and kill them. Each night, you can choose whether you want to be Bulletproof or Investigation Immune. You cannot be both of them on the same night, but you can choose your ability for each night separately.
      [list][*]Bulletproof: Any night-kill which targets you (at the same night) is ignored. You are not informed whether anyone tried to kill you or not.
      [*]Investigation Immune: If you are investigated by a Cop, they will get a result of [Not Guilty].[/list]

      You win if only you are alive, or if nothing can prevent the same. The game thread is here <link>.[/quote]


      Alive (8)

      k Mafia Game 280 (Newbie Game 105)
      Madelyn   545
      N Apr 26, 2024 by fdas
      Welcome to Mafia Game 280: Berry Mafia

      Important Rules:
      Do not edit or delete posts
      Do not post during night
      Do not post if you are dead or if you are not in the game
      Do not talk about anything related to this game outside this thread
      Read all the rules!


      Rules
      [list][*]Rules
      [list]
      [*]1.1: Read the rules. All of them. Read them multiple times if necessary.
      [*]1.2: Do not post at night.
      [*]1.3: You may PM me at any time and ask me anything, such as rule clarification.
      [*]1.4: Do not talk about this game outside of this topic to anyone other than the mods in charge, unless I specifically allow you to do so.
      [*]1.5: You may not use any formatting that has an effect of concealing text. This includes size=1, hide="", color=#FFFFFF, and color=white, among others. This does not include adding extra spaces.
      [*]1.6: Do not edit or delete posts you have already submitted; this includes editing right after you post (what goes in the thread stays in the thread). If you for any reason find the need to change your post, use EBWOP or EBWON as necessary.
      [*]1.7: If you are not a living participant of the game, do not post anything else about the game anywhere. You may still spectate the game, but you may no longer post in this thread.
      [*]1.8: Do not advocate for breaking the rules.
      [*]1.9: Do not use the colors red (#FF0000), blue (#0000FF), green (#00FF00), or anything that appears similar, as these colors are used for modding purposes.
      [*]1.10: Confirm your participation in the game by making a post stating the important rules[/list]

      [*] Voting/Hanging
      [list]
      [*] 2.1: Post votes in code or bold tags in the format [code][code]Vote: <insert player here>[/code][/code] or [code]Vote: <insert player here>[/b][/code]
      You must spell the username of the player you wish to vote exactly, including capitalization. A proper vote looks like [code]Vote: fdas[/code] or Vote: fdas
      [*] 2.2: Votes may not be placed in hide tags.
      [*] 2.3: Improperly made votes will not be counted under any circumstances. It does not matter if it is the end of the game hammer and everyone revealed their roles. Hint: dont reveal your roles and declare victory until I made the official end of the game post.
      [*] 2.4: You may vote for no hang to occur during a day. Vote this by including in your post [code]Vote: No Hang[/code]
      [*] 2.5: You do not have to unvote before making a new vote, though it is appreciated if you do so. Unvote in the format [code]Vote: Unvote[/code]
      An unvote will undo your previous vote, if any.
      [*] 2.6: Spell the username of the player you wish to vote for exactly. Do not use nicknames.
      [*] 2.7: If at any point in a day more than half of the votes are for a single player, that player will be hanged. It will then immediately be twilight.
      [*] 2.8: If at any point in a day at least half of the votes are for no hang, then there will be no hang. It will then be twilight.
      [*] 2.9: If the deadline is met and no person is hanged, it will be considered no hang and will proceed to be twilight.
      [*] 2.10: The moment the deadline passes, no more votes will be counted even if the mod has not made a post.
      [*] 2.11: During twilight, players may still post. However, no more votes and/or unvotes will be processed.
      [*] 2.12: Once I post a end-of-day scene, the person hanged (if any) is officially dead. Night then immediately begins. You may not post during night.[/list]

      [*] Activity
      [list]
      [*] 3.1: Each day will be 336 hours (2 weeks). The moderator may extend the deadline for the end of the day at his/her discretion. Note that this will be unlikely.
      [*] 3.2: The deadlines will follow the official time
      [*] 3.3: The deadline will occur the very second 336 hours has occurred.
      [*] 3.4: The night deadline will be 72 hours after night begins.
      [*] 3.5: When the night deadline is met, if the moderator does not receive a night action from either a player or his/her partner(s) (if you have them), the player will lose the chance to perform an action during that night.
      [*] 3.6: Any night results will be sent after the night deadline
      [*] 3.7: Night will end at some time after the night deadline when the mod makes the post announcing the end of night.
      [*] 3.8: If a player does not post in a 48-hour period and he/she is not in V/LA, you will receive an in-game prod.
      [*] 3.9: If a player does not post in another 24-hour period after receiving an in-game prod and he/she is not in V/LA, he/she will receive a PM prod.
      [*] 3.10: If a player does not post in another 48-hour period after receiving a PM prod and he/she is not in V/LA, he/she will be replaced, unless you post before the moderator finds a replacement.
      [*] 3.11: If a player receives 5 PM Prods, he/she will be replaced
      [*] 3.12: If a player is going to be V/LA, he/she must post in bold in-thread or PM me. The moderator will not prod the player unless the V/LA is too long.[list]


      [*]Etiquette
      [list]
      [*] 4.1: Do not use inappropriate language.
      [*] 4.2: Do not make any personal attacks.
      [*] 4.3: Follow all of the rules.
      [*] 4.4: Be mature.
      [*] 4.5: For a minor rule infraction, players can receive up to two warnings. If a player commits an infraction after he/she has run out of warnings, or commits a modkill level infraction, he/she will be modkilled or force replaced. Please do not make me modkill you.[/list]


      [*] Moderators/Co-Moderators
      [list]
      [*] 5.1: I Madelyn am the moderator of Mafia Game 276, and aayr is the co-moderator.
      [*] 5.2: Red-colored text (#FF0000) is used for official votecounts and activity checks by the moderators. It is also used for mafia flavor-related posts.
      [*] 5.3: Blue-colored text (#0000FF) is used for the moderator and co-mod's posts other than votecounts and activity checks.
      [*] 5.4: Green-colored text (#00FF00) is used for town flavor-related posts.
      [*] 5.5: The not voting section is to be ignored if it contradicts any other part of the votecount
      [*] 5.6: If an error to the votecount is not pointed out within 5 days, the incorrect votecount will become official.
      [*] 5.7: The moderator may change the rules at any time.
      [*] 5.8: The moderator has the last say in interpreting the rules. [/list]


      [*] Read all of the rules[/list]

      Setup
      This game will use the Matrix6 setup. This is a semi-open setup.

      In this setup, there are 9 players. Three of the roles will be generated randomly by picking a row or column from the matrix. Then one Mafia Goon and 5 Vanilla Townies are added to maintain a 2:7 mafia:town ratio. The six possible setups are:
      1. 5 Vanilla Townies, 1 Town Jailkeeper, 1 1-Shot Bulletproof Townie, 1 Mafia Roleblocker, 1 Mafia Goon
      2. 6 Vanilla Townies, 1 Town Cop, 2 Mafia Goons
      3. 5 Vanilla Townies, 1 Town Doctor, 1 Town Tracker, 2 Mafia Goons
      4. 6 Vanilla Townies, 1 Town Jailkeeper, 2 Mafia Goons
      5. 5 Vanilla Townies, 1 Town Cop, 1 Town Doctor, 1 Mafia Goon, 1 Mafia Roleblocker
      6. 5 Vanilla Townies, 1 1-Shot Bulletproof Townie, 1 Town Tracker, 2 Mafia Goons


      Role PMs
      [quote]You are a grape (Vanilla Townie).

      Phew, you are actually a berry! Grapes are a simple fruit, liked by everyone, but there is nothing special about you. It is your goal to bring change to how the garden defines berries.

      You have no other power other than your voice and vote.

      You win when all fruits not botanically classified as berries (Mafia) are dead.[/quote]

      [quote]You are a cranberry (Cop).

      You paid attention in third grade when you learned about fruits and berries, and even kept your worksheet about it. You float to the top for a reason. Armed with this knowledge, you are able to determine whether a plant produces berries or not.

      Every night, you may target one person and determine their alignment.

      You win when all fruits not botanically classified as berries (Mafia) are dead.[/quote]

      [quote]You are an elderberry (Doctor).

      Elderberries are known for their healing properties. Used in teas, pills, creams, and candies, this natural supplement is known to boost the immune system and lessen cold symptoms. If you give another plant some of your berries, they will be able to withstand Roundup for the night.

      Every night you may heal someone, allowing them to survive if they would have otherwise died. You may not heal yourself two nights in a row.

      You win when all fruits not botanically classified as berries (Mafia) are dead.[/quote]

      [quote]You are a blueberry (Tracker).

      Everyone lovvvves blueberries. But they make a bit of a mess when eaten. When someone eats your fruit, sticky purple fingerprints will be left wherever they go.

      Every night you may target someone and learn who they visited.

      You win when all fruits not botanically classified as berries (Mafia) are dead.[/quote]

      [quote]You are a watermelon (Jailkeeper).

      You are one of the biggest, sturdiest fruits in the garden. Your thick rind can protect other plants while also preventing them from causing any mischief.

      Each night you may choose someone to put in jail. That person will be unable to perform any actions that night and night kills attempting to target that person will be blocked.

      You win when all fruits not botanically classified as berries (Mafia) are dead.[/quote]

      [quote]You are a banana (1-Shot Bulletproof Townie).

      As a wise person once said, [Bananas] have layers. Your thick, inedible peel protects you from harm.

      On the first time that you are attacked by the Mafia, that kill will be negated.

      You win when all fruits not botanically classified as berries (Mafia) are dead.[/quote]

      [quote]You are a strawberry (Mafia Goon).

      You are shocked to learn that you are not, in fact, a berry! Your view of the garden, of life, and of your own self-worth is shattered. The culinary definition of a berry has worked for all these years, why should it change now! Oh, and, you have access to the gardeners shed, where you can obtain Roundup (hehe).

      You may talk with your partner () here. Every night you or your partner may use Roundup on one plant, killing them.

      You win when all plants botanically classified as berries (Town) are dead.[/quote]

      [quote]You are a blackberry (Mafia Roleblocker).

      Unfortunately, you are only a berry by the culinary definition. You hope to uphold this definition in the garden and maintain your status. Blackberries are tasty but they contain a lot of seeds. Every night, you may give blackberries to another plant, and they will be unable to do anything but pick seeds out of their teeth for the rest of the night. Oh, and, you have access to the gardeners shed, where you can obtain Roundup (hehe).

      You may talk with your partner () here. Every night you or your partner may use Roundup on one plant, killing them. You may also target someone, and that person will be unable to perform any actions that night. Your ability takes precedence over the jailkeeper.

      You win when all plants botanically classified as berries (Town) are dead.[/quote]


      Alive (6)

      k Mafia Game 279: The Trading Village
      NDMath   3399
      N Apr 26, 2024 by fdas
      Mafia Game 279
      Dock, The Trading Village


      [list][*]Rules
      [list]
      [*]Read the rules. All of them. Read them multiple times if necessary.
      [*]Do not post at night.
      [*]You may PM me at any time and ask me anything, such as rule clarification.
      [*]Do not quote or pretend to quote any PMs from me, including role PMs.
      [*]Do not talk about this game outside of this topic to anyone other than the mods in charge, unless I specifically allow you to do so.
      [*]Day chat will be enabled via an AoPS private forum.
      [*]You may not use any formatting that has an effect of concealing text. This includes hide="", color=#FFFFFF, and color=white, among others.
      [*]Do not edit or delete posts you have already submitted; this includes editing right after you post (what goes in the thread stays in the thread). If you for any reason find the need to change your post, use EBWOP or EBWON as necessary.
      [*]If you are not a living participant of the game, do not post anything else about the game anywhere. You may still spectate the game, but you may no longer post in this thread.
      [*]Do not advocate for breaking the rules.
      [*]Do not imitate the mods.[/list]

      [*] Voting/Elimination
      [list]
      [*]This game will partially use the voting rules philosophy of "if it looks like a vote, it's a vote". So spelling/capitalization does not matter so long as the Vote: part is right, and the following two rules are met.
      [*]Post votes in bold font in the format "Vote: <insert player here>", or c or code text: [code]Vote: <insert player here>[/code].
      [*]Votes may not be placed in hide tags.
      [*]You may vote for no elimination to occur during a day. Vote this by including in your post "Vote: No Elimination" or: [code]Vote: No Elimination[/code].
      [*]You do not have to unvote before making a new vote, though you have the ability to do so. Unvote in the format "Vote: Unvote" or: [code]Vote: Unvote[/code]. An unvote will undo your previous vote, if any.
      [*]If the deadline is met the player with the most votes is eliminated. If there is a tie, the player who received the votes first is eliminated. If No Elimination is part of the tie, No Elimination occurs.
      [*]Starting day 2, If more than half of the votes are for a single player, that player will be eliminated. It will then immediately be twilight.
      [*]Starting day 2, If at least half of the votes are for no elimination, then there will be no elimination. It will then be twilight.
      [*]The moment the deadline passes, it will be twilight and no more votes will be counted even if the mod has not made a post.
      [*]During twilight, players may still post. However, no more votes and/or unvotes will be processed.
      [*]Once I (or the comod) post a end-of-day scene, the person eliminated (if any) is officially dead. Night then immediately begins. You may not post during night.[/list]


      [*] Activity
      [list]
      [*]Each day will be 240 hours (10 days). The moderator may extend the deadline for the end of the day at their discretion.
      [*]The deadline will occur the very second 240 hours has occurred.
      [*]The night deadline will be 48 hours after night begins.
      [*]When the night deadline is met, if the moderator does not receive a night action from either a player or his/her partner(s) (if you have them), the player will lose the chance to perform an action during that night.
      [*]Night will end at some time after the night deadline when the mod makes the post announcing the end of night.
      [*]If a player does not post in a 48-hour period and they are not in V/LA, you will receive a PM prod.
      [*]If a player does not post in another 24-hour period after receiving a PM prod and they are not in V/LA, they will be replaced, unless you post before the moderator finds a replacement.
      [*]If a player is going to be V/LA, they must PM me. The moderator will not prod the player unless the V/LA is too long.[list]


      [*]Etiquette
      [list]
      [*]Do not use inappropriate language or make personal attacks.
      [*]Be mature.
      [*]The game is to not be considered over until the mod declares it as such.
      [*]Don't intentionally/purposely gamethrow. If you believe you can no longer win talk to me in your role pm.
      [*]For a minor rule infraction, players can receive up to two warnings. If a player commits an infraction after they have run out of warnings, or commits a modkill level infraction, they may be modkilled or force replaced. Please do not make me modkill you.[/list]


      [*] Moderators/Co-Moderators
      [list]
      [*]I (NDMath) am the moderator of Mafia Game 279.
      [*]This brown (#974E03) is my mod color. Do not post in anything too similar.
      [*]The moderator may change the rules at any time.
      [*]The moderator has the last say in interpreting the rules.[/list]


      [*] Read all of the rules[/list]
      Story
      Dock was a small village in the province of pi on the west coast of an island. The small village had seemingly remained unaffected by the mafia, but that was not to say they weren't lurking about. A boat sunk not far off the coast, and the passengers managed to swim to shore, with many taking refuge in the village. The sudden influx of visitors and people trying to move in put the village of Dock into high alert.

      This village has been believed to be a key target for the mafia for a while, as if they could control and stop the imports to the island it would be that much easier to control the entire island. Suspectum Industries upper management responded to the theory with something along the lines of "Yeah, sure, that makes sense. We'll get on it right away." To which they had not yet gotten on it, whatever that may mean, leaving the Dock Village to fend for itself.

      With the village having the port onto and off of the island, it became known as the Trading Village, as it was the prime spot to trade gems and other goods for tools and other equipment. Someone would always trade their tool for the most valuable gem offered, although people tended to be a bit biased as to the worth of the gem in their own possession.


      Setup
      The setup is closed, but there is exactly 10 town and 3 mafia.
      There are no vanilla players, for this game the 'vanilla' equivalent is the Trader role.
      Mafia are multitasking by default.

      The action resolution for this game is Reasonable Action Resolution.
      Private Chats are via AoPS forum with daychat enabled.
      No action may self-target unless stated otherwise in the player's role pm.

      [quote=Example Town Trader Role PM]Welcome NDMath to Mafia Game 279

      You are a Town Trader.

      Each night, you may target a player to attempt to trade roles with them. This exchange will occur at the end of the night, after the player being traded with would have used their night action if they have one. Your trade attempt fails if you die the same night, but you can trade with a dying player (causing them to flip as your Trader role). Attempting to trade with someone who started the night as a Trader also fails. If two traders attempt to trade with the same target, only the trader with the smaller hidden priority number will succeed.

      You win when all mafia members are dead.[/quote]

      Each Trader has a unique priority number from 1 to N, Town never has access to these priority numbers but mafia learn the priority number of Trader roles they possess and of those that die.


      Alive (7)
      DXtreme - Town Bodyguard
      NoSignOfTheta - Town Neighborizer
      Madelyn Aminecraftbear - Town Result Receiver
      ChrisalonaLiverspur - Town Lazy Follower
      Socoobo - Town Trader
      BrilliantBanana - Mafia 3-Shot Jailkeeper
      RadioActive1729 - Town Amnesiac Cop

      Dead (6)
      BananaBall00 - Mafia Trader
      candythecorgi - Town Trader
      violetmx12 - Mafia 1-Shot Bulletproof
      ad333 - Town Trader
      aayr - Town Trader
      mathjay - Town Trader


      Notable Stuff
      Day 1 Start
      Madelyn replaces Aminecraftbear
      Day 1 Ends; Night 1 Starts
      Night 1 Ends; Day 2 Begins
      Day 2 Ends; Night 2 Starts
      Night 2 Ends; Day 3 Begins
      Day 3 Ends; Night 3 Begins
      Night 3 Ends; Day 4 Begins
      Game Ends!

      k Mafia Game 278: Deja Vu: Perpetual MYLO | Night 1

      Welcome to Mafia Game 278

      Important Rules:
      Do not edit or delete posts
      Do not post during night
      Do not post if you are dead or if you are not in the game
      Do not talk about anything related to this game outside this thread
      Read all the rules!


      Rules
      [list][*]Rules
      [list]
      [*]1.1: Read the rules. All of them. Read them multiple times if necessary.
      [*]1.2: Do not post at night.
      [*]1.3: You may PM me at any time and ask me anything, such as rule clarification.
      [*]1.4: Do not talk about this game outside of this topic to anyone other than the mods in charge, unless I specifically allow you to do so.
      [*]1.5: You may not use any formatting that has an effect of concealing text. This includes size=1, hide="", color=#FFFFFF, and color=white, among others. This does not include adding extra spaces.
      [*]1.6: Do not edit or delete posts you have already submitted; this includes editing right after you post (what goes in the thread stays in the thread). If you for any reason find the need to change your post, use EBWOP or EBWON as necessary.
      [*]1.7: If you are not a living participant of the game, do not post anything else about the game anywhere. You may still spectate the game, but you may no longer post in this thread.
      [*]1.8: Do not advocate for breaking the rules.
      [*]1.9: Do not use the colors red (#FF0000), green (#00FF00), light purple (#BAADEF) or anything that appears similar, as these colors are used for modding purposes.
      [*]1.10: Confirm your participation in the game by making a post stating the important rules and praising the moderator for his kind work in moderating this game.[/list]

      [*] Voting/Hanging
      [list]
      [*] 2.1: Post votes in code tags in the format [code][code]Vote: <insert player here>[/code][/code]
      Since AoPS does not distinguish between usernames with different capitalizations, the capitalization of the player name does not matter. A proper vote looks like [code]Vote: fdas[/code]
      [*] 2.2: Votes may not be placed in hide tags.
      [*] 2.3: Improperly made votes will not be counted under any circumstances. It does not matter if it is the end of the game hammer and everyone revealed their roles. Hint: dont reveal your roles and declare victory until I made the official end of the game post.
      [*] 2.4: You may vote for no hang to occur during a day. Vote this by including in your post [code]Vote: No Hang[/code]
      [*] 2.5: You do not have to unvote before making a new vote, though it is appreciated if you do so. Unvote in the format [code]Vote: Unvote[/code]
      An unvote will undo your previous vote, if any.
      [*] 2.6: Spell the username of the player you wish to vote for exactly. Do not use nicknames.
      [*] 2.7: If at any point in a day more than half of the votes are for a single player, that player will be hanged. It will then immediately be twilight.
      [*] 2.8: If at any point in a day at least half of the votes are for no hang, then there will be no hang. It will then be twilight.
      [*] 2.9: If the deadline is met and no person is hanged, it will be considered no hang and will proceed to be twilight.
      [*] 2.10: The moment the deadline passes, no more votes will be counted even if the mod has not made a post.
      [*] 2.11: During twilight, players may still post. However, no more votes and/or unvotes will be processed.
      [*] 2.12: Once I post a end-of-day scene, the person hanged (if any) is officially dead. Night then immediately begins. You may not post during night.[/list]

      [*] Activity
      [list]
      [*] 3.1: Each day will be 240 hours (10 days). The moderator may extend the deadline for the end of the day at his/her discretion. Note that this will be unlikely.
      [*] 3.2: The deadlines will follow the official time
      [*] 3.3: The deadline will occur the very second 240 hours has occurred.
      [*] 3.4: The night deadline will be 48 hours after night begins.
      [*] 3.5: When the night deadline is met, if the moderator does not receive a night action from either a player or his/her partner(s) (if you have them), the player will lose the chance to perform an action during that night.
      [*] 3.6: Any night results will be sent after the night deadline
      [*] 3.7: Night will end at some time after the night deadline when the mod makes the post announcing the end of night.
      [*] 3.8: If a player does not post in a 48-hour period and he/she is not in V/LA, you will receive an in-game prod.
      [*] 3.9: If a player does not post in another 24-hour period after receiving an in-game prod and he/she is not in V/LA, he/she will receive a PM prod.
      [*] 3.10: If a player does not post in another 24-hour period after receiving a PM prod and he/she is not in V/LA, he/she will be replaced, unless you post before the moderator finds a replacement.
      [*] 3.11: If a player receives 5 PM Prods, he/she will be replaced
      [*] 3.12: If a player is going to be V/LA, he/she must post in bold in-thread or PM me. The moderator will not prod the player unless the V/LA is too long.[list]


      [*]Etiquette
      [list]
      [*] 4.1: Do not use inappropriate language.
      [*] 4.2: Do not make any personal attacks.
      [*] 4.3: Follow all of the rules.
      [*] 4.4: Be mature.
      [*] 4.5: For a minor rule infraction, players can receive up to two warnings. If a player commits an infraction after he/she has run out of warnings, or commits a modkill level infraction, he/she will be modkilled or force replaced. Please do not make me modkill you.[/list]


      [*] Moderators/Co-Moderators
      [list]
      [*] 5.1: I, nsd08 am the moderator of Mafia Game 276
      [*] 5.2: Red-colored text (#FF0000) is used for official votecounts and activity checks by the moderators. It is also used for mafia flavor-related posts.
      [*] 5.3: Blue-colored text (#0000FF) is used for the moderator and co-mod's posts other than votecounts and activity checks.
      [*] 5.4: Green-colored text (#00FF00) is used for town flavor-related posts.
      [*] 5.5: The not voting section is to be ignored if it contradicts any other part of the votecount
      [*] 5.6: If an error to the votecount is not pointed out within 5 days, the incorrect votecount will become official.
      [*] 5.7: The moderator may change the rules at any time.
      [*] 5.8: The moderator has the last say in interpreting the rules. [/list]


      [*] Read all of the rules[/list]

      Setup
      This game will use the Perpetual MYLO setup. This is an open setup.
      Five Mafia vs. seven Town

      If the town successfully eliminates a Mafia player on a particular day, then the Mafia team kills a Town player that night. However, if the town eliminates incorrectly, then the Mafia team has to sacrifice one of their own the following night.

      Town wins if they eliminate three mafia goons before they eliminate town three times.

      Mafia wins if they eliminate town three times before three of their members are eliminated.

      If there's no majority at deadline, there's no elimination.

      If this happens once, the Mafia will be required to No-Kill on the following night.

      If this happens again, then the Mafia will get to make a Kill the following night.


      Role PMs
      [quote]You are a Vanilla Townie. You have no other power other than your vote.

      You win when 3 members of the Mafia have been eliminated by vote.[/quote]

      [quote]You are a Mafia Goon. At all times you may talk with your partners here to discuss who you want to kill.

      You win when 3 members of the Town have been eliminated by vote.[/quote]


      Alive (12)

      k Mafia Game 277: Fdas UPick Mafia
      fdas   7322
      N Mar 5, 2024 by scannose
      Welcome to Mafia Game 277: Fdas UPick Mafia
      Rules
      [list][*]Rules
      [list]
      [*]1.1: Read the rules. All of them. Read them multiple times if necessary.
      [*]1.2: Do not post at night.
      [*]1.3: You may PM me at any time and ask me anything, such as rule clarification.
      [*]1.4: Do not quote or pretend to quote any PMs from me, including role PMs. Do not discuss which roles you submitted for the game or make any hints about what your picks were. Do not refer to private conversations with the moderator in any way unless given permission.
      [*]1.5: Do not talk about this game outside of this topic to anyone other than the mods in charge, unless I specifically allow you to do so.
      [*]1.6: You may not use any formatting that has an effect of concealing text. This includes size=1, hide="", color=#FFFFFF, and color=white, among others. This does not include adding extra spaces.
      [*]1.7: Do not edit or delete posts you have already submitted; this includes editing right after you post (what goes in the thread stays in the thread). If you for any reason find the need to change your post, use EBWOP or EBWON as necessary.
      [*]1.8: If you are not a living participant of the game, do not post anything else about the game anywhere. You may still spectate the game, but you may no longer post in this thread.
      [*]1.9: Do not advocate for breaking the rules.
      [*]1.10: Do not use the colors red (#FF0000), blue (#0000FF), green (#00FF00), or anything that appears similar, as these colors are used for modding purposes.
      [*]1.11: Confirm by including a 3 digit number in your post which corresponds to one of the games that was modded by fdas that was not already mentioned.[/list]

      [*] Voting/Hanging
      [list]
      [*] 2.1: Post votes in code tags in the format [code]Vote: <insert player here>[/code]
      Since AoPS does not distinguish between usernames with different capitalizations, the capitalization of the player name does not matter. A proper vote looks like [code]Vote: fdas[/code]
      [*] 2.2: Votes may not be placed in hide tags.
      [*] 2.3: Improperly made votes will not be counted under any circumstances. It does not matter if it is the end of the game hammer and everyone revealed their roles. Hint: dont reveal your roles and declare victory until I made the official end of the game post.
      [*] 2.4: You may vote for no hang to occur during a day. Vote this by including in your post [code]Vote: No Hang[/code]
      [*] 2.5: You do not have to unvote before making a new vote, though it is appreciated if you do so. Unvote in the format [code]Vote: Unvote[/code]
      An unvote will undo your previous vote, if any.
      [*] 2.6: Spell the username of the player you wish to vote for exactly. Do not use nicknames.
      [*] 2.7: If at any point in a day more than half of the votes are for a single player, that player will be hanged. It will then immediately be twilight.
      [*] 2.8: If at any point in a day at least half of the votes are for no hang, then there will be no hang. It will then be twilight.
      [*] 2.9: If the deadline is met and no person is hanged, it will be considered no hang and will proceed to be twilight.
      [*] 2.10: The moment the deadline passes, no more votes will be counted even if the mod has not made a post.
      [*] 2.11: During twilight, players may still post. However, no more votes and/or unvotes will be processed.
      [*] 2.12: Once I post a end-of-day scene, the person hanged (if any) is officially dead. Night then immediately begins. You may not post during night.[/list]

      [*] Activity
      [list]
      [*] 3.1: Each day will be 336 hours (2 weeks). The moderator may extend the deadline for the end of the day at his/her discretion. Note that this will be unlikely.
      [*] 3.2: The deadlines will follow the official time
      [*] 3.3: The deadline will occur the very second 336 hours has occurred.
      [*] 3.4: Night will be split into two phases. The first phase of night ends 72 hours after night starts. The second phase of night ends 48 hours after the first phase of night ends. All night actions must be finalized by the end of the first phase of night unless your role pm specifies otherwise.
      [*] 3.5: When the night deadline is met, if the moderator does not receive a night action from either a player or his/her partner(s) (if you have them), the player will lose the chance to perform an action during that night.
      [*] 3.6: Any night results will be sent after the night deadline
      [*] 3.7: Night will end at some time after the night deadline when the mod makes the post announcing the end of night.
      [*] 3.8: If a player does not post in a 48-hour period and he/she is not in V/LA, you will receive an in-game prod.
      [*] 3.9: If a player does not post in another 24-hour period after receiving an in-game prod and he/she is not in V/LA, he/she will receive a PM prod.
      [*] 3.10: If a player does not post in another 48-hour period after receiving a PM prod and he/she is not in V/LA, he/she will be replaced, unless you post before the moderator finds a replacement.
      [*] 3.11: If a player receives 5 PM Prods, he/she will be replaced
      [*] 3.12: If a player is going to be V/LA, he/she must post in bold in-thread or PM me. The moderator will not prod the player unless the V/LA is too long.[list]


      [*]Etiquette
      [list]
      [*] 4.1: Do not use inappropriate language.
      [*] 4.2: Do not make any personal attacks.
      [*] 4.3: Follow all of the rules.
      [*] 4.4: Be mature.
      [*] 4.5: For a minor rule infraction, players can receive up to two warnings. If a player commits an infraction after he/she has run out of warnings, or commits a modkill level infraction, he/she will be modkilled or force replaced. Please do not make me modkill you.[/list]


      [*] Moderators/Co-Moderators
      [list]
      [*] 5.1: I fdas am the moderator of Mafia Game 277
      [*] 5.2: The not voting section is to be ignored if it contradicts any other part of the votecount
      [*] 5.3: If an error to the votecount is not pointed out within 5 days, the incorrect votecount will become official.
      [*] 5.4: The moderator may change the rules at any time.
      [*] 5.5: The moderator has the last say in interpreting the rules. [/list]


      [*] Read all of the rules[/list]

      Setup
      This game is a upick which means that the setup of the game is partially determined by the players themselves. After signing up, each player should privately message me a list of 3 roles from one of the games I had moderated in the past with no more than one role from the same game. One of these roles will be selected to be in the game, but role distribution is randomized. The role's power and wincon may be modified in order to allow it to properly fit into the game.

      Vote modifying roles may exist in the game. Alignment changing roles may exist in the game. Certain players may be provided with mock role PMs for fakeclaim purposes.

      List of Games
      Mafia Game 110
      Mafia Game 114
      Mafia Game 118
      Mafia Game 120
      Mafia Game 145
      Mafia Game 161
      Mafia Game 171
      Mafia Game 175
      Mafia Game 179
      Mafia Game 186
      Mafia Game 189
      Mafia Game 191
      Mafia Game 193
      Mafia Game 198
      (Mafia Game 200 is omitted from selection on account of already being a game composed of roles from previous games. You may refer to it to see how a role might be modified in order to fit this game.)
      Mafia Game 205
      Mafia Game 220
      Mafia Game 221
      Mafia Game 233
      Mafia Game 242
      Mafia Game 246
      Mafia Game 253
      Mafia Game 255
      Mafia Game 260
      Mafia Game 263
      Mafia Game 268
      Mafia Game 271

      Events
      Day 1: Kea13 hanged. Nothing happened.
      Night 1: nsd08, galaxy1220, cherryolive died
      Day 2: NoSignOfTheta hanged. Nothing happened.
      Night 2: ad333, Madelyn died
      Day 3: ibmo0907, DXtreme, aayr hanged. They died.
      Night 3: WisteriaV died.
      Day 4: RadioActive1729 hanged. They died.
      Night 4: candythecorgi died.
      Day 5: ChrisalonaLiverspur hanged. They died.


      PM Prods
       


      Warnings
       


      Story
      A collection of 20 individuals appeared in a large stadium in a flash of light. They were a motley group, coming from a diverse set of universes. Above them, fdas sat on a overhanging balcony and clapped.

      "Good, you're all here," he said. "You all know what its time for now."

      "Not another one of these. I died last time," one said.

      "I didn't die," another said, chuckling.

      "Well lucky you. You'll be the first one dying this time then."

      "We'll see about that."

      "Well hopefully I don't die because of a bunch of idiots this time. Can any of you, like, think for once."

      "That's enough," fdas said. "Not all of you may want to be here, but you're here now. And there's no escape. Now, let me explain the rules this time."

      "It doesn't matter who you all were in your past life. You could have been an ordinary person, a crazy criminal, a god, or a professional jobber. Your past affiliations no longer matter. All that remains is the color you will receive. Yes, all of you will receive a color denoting what team you are on in this game."

      "The Green Teamwill be the most numerous one. However, you will also be the least well informed. Your enemies will be the Red Team, Brown Team, and Purple Team. Do be aware that not everyone of the same color will necessarily have the same goals in this game."

      "There are three things you will need in order to be successful in this game. An open mind able to consider all possibilities, an intelligent mind able to determine the implications of each possibility, and a sound mind unswayed by biases and emotion. But last of all, Good Luck."

      With that said, fdas vanished and the participants were left to fend for themselves.


      Do not post until this line is crossed out.

      Day 1 begins at 14:00:00 EST 18 November 2023.
      7322 replies
      fdas

      scannose
