      Mafia Awards 2023 - Discussion Thread
      NDMath   105
      N Feb 15, 2024 by Aminecraftbear
      This is the 2023 Mafia Awards discussion thread, (better late than never? maybe)

      Discuss the 2023 Mafia Awards in this thread, (not in the nominations thread once it's created). Planned schedule is for Nominations thread to open on the 11th, nominations to close on the 25th and for voting to finish on the 3rd. Players that were around for most or all of 2023 are encouraged to make nominations.

      Eligible mafia games are those that finished between January 1st 2023, and December 31st 2023, and Game 277 since I don't want to be forced to analyze it again in eleven months.
      This means the eligible games are mafia game 260, and 262-277.

      Games by Faction Winner & mafia team
      (it is probable I'm missing a couple co-moderators, and highly probable that several usernames are misspelled, missing numbers etc.)



      Current Award Categories (categories subject to change):

      Best New Player
      This category is for players who played exceptionally well, despite being relatively inexperienced. Generally, players in this category should have played well in their first 1-2 games. Players must have had their first completed game this year. Previous winner: WisteriaV
      Eligible Newbies, (possible errors)
      -263
      itsjustWanderlust13
      lovematch13
      stayhomedomath
      -268
      lucaswujc
      dragonlouis
      Aminecraftbear
      saturnrocket
      DXtreme
      -271
      Kea13
      BluePhoenix88
      Wesoar
      AlienGirl05
      Awesomeness_in_a_Bun
      -276
      BrilliantBanana
      RhinocerosHornbill
      -Other
      aayr


      Most Improved
      This category is for players who had a drastic improvement in their games this year. This can be from games they played last year to this year or an improvement over the past year. Previous winner: ad333


      Best Flavor
      This flavor is not only the one that accompanies the game, but improves it. This exciting, humorous storyline makes its game more fun to play in, and more awesome to read for generations to follow. Previous Winner: Game 250 mathjay & NDMath


      Best Setup
      A setup that enhances the game and makes it more fun for everyone, be it. The setup must be created for the game. Previous winner: Game 257 chess24

      Eligible Setups
      260 - fdas
      265 - NDMath
      269 - chess24
      272 - Socoobo
      274 - ostriches88
      275 - NDMath
      277 - fdas


      Best Mod Performance
      This is the best game run overall. It may be because of a brilliant setup, smooth flow, or easy handling of a complex game situation. Previous winner: None


      Best Mod
      These are the mods whose games run smoothly, without any hiccups, and resolve disputes swiftly and easily. Their games are easy to play in and they don't have to be reminded of their job often. Previous winner: mathjay


      Most Dedicated
      These players got heavily invested in all of the games they played this year. You knew they would be a big part of it no matter what they were doing or what faction they were. Previous winner: mathjay


      Best Performance by a Townie
      These are the townies who carried their team in their respective games. They tried to and were successful in searching for and finding scum, and without them, their team may not have won. Previous winner: aroodman, 254


      Best Performance by a Town Team
      These are the games where town won through a significant team effort. Multiple players shared and bounced around ideas in order to find the scum, and scum stood no chance against their combined efforts. Previous winner: 251


      Best Overall Town Player
      This is the player who always creates a significant impact on the game with their scumhunting and significant influence. As a scum player, you are afraid to find that they are playing in the same game as you. Previous winner: None


      Best Performance by an Anti-town Player
      These are the players that effortlessly fooled the town and maintained firm control over the uninformed majority. They slipped out of everyone's fingers and earned the respect of everyone in the process. Previous winner: falliinqsnow-, 256


      Best Performance by an Anti-town Team
      These teams worked together to throw all of the town's plans out of whack. They hid themselves and their alliance well enough to outlast all of their enemies. Previous winner: ad333 & falliinqsnow-, 257


      Best Overall Anti-town Player
      Whenever this person plays a game, the other players all worry about the possibility that they might be scum, well aware that they will never be caught. Previous winner: falliinqsnow-


      Best Usage of a PR
      As either alignment, PRs can be very useful, especially when used right. This player used their role to affect the game in important ways, helping their alignment win. Previous Winner: Mathletesv, 257


      Best Overall Mechanical Player
      Whether this player has a knack for using their role in helpful ways, or simply manages all of the mechanical information, more PR-heavy games would not be possible without them. Previous Winner: Mathletesv


      Funniest Moment
      What moment this year made everyone laugh their butts off? What has become a running joke throughout the community? Previous Winner: Cosmosiq's reads in Game 258


      Best Post
      Define "best" however you want, just provide a link to the post in question. Previous Winner: N/A


      Best Game
      The best overall Game. Previous Winner: Game 257


      MVP
      This is the player you love to see on your team no matter the situation, and constantly fear when they are on the other team. No matter what faction they are, they will always change the course of they game in their favor. Previous winner: None
      105 replies
      NDMath
      Feb 5, 2024
      Aminecraftbear
      Feb 15, 2024
      J
      H
      h

      k Mafia Game 276 (Newbie Game 104)
      fdas   530
      N Feb 11, 2024 by fdas
      Welcome to Mafia Game 276

      Important Rules:
      Do not edit or delete posts
      Do not post during night
      Do not post if you are dead or if you are not in the game
      Do not talk about anything related to this game outside this thread
      Read all the rules!


      Rules
      [list][*]Rules
      [list]
      [*]1.1: Read the rules. All of them. Read them multiple times if necessary.
      [*]1.2: Do not post at night.
      [*]1.3: You may PM me at any time and ask me anything, such as rule clarification.
      [*]1.4: Do not talk about this game outside of this topic to anyone other than the mods in charge, unless I specifically allow you to do so.
      [*]1.5: You may not use any formatting that has an effect of concealing text. This includes size=1, hide="", color=#FFFFFF, and color=white, among others. This does not include adding extra spaces.
      [*]1.6: Do not edit or delete posts you have already submitted; this includes editing right after you post (what goes in the thread stays in the thread). If you for any reason find the need to change your post, use EBWOP or EBWON as necessary.
      [*]1.7: If you are not a living participant of the game, do not post anything else about the game anywhere. You may still spectate the game, but you may no longer post in this thread.
      [*]1.8: Do not advocate for breaking the rules.
      [*]1.9: Do not use the colors red (#FF0000), blue (#0000FF), green (#00FF00), or anything that appears similar, as these colors are used for modding purposes.
      [*]1.10: Confirm your participation in the game by making a post stating the important rules[/list]

      [*] Voting/Hanging
      [list]
      [*] 2.1: Post votes in code tags in the format [code][code]Vote: <insert player here>[/code][/code]
      Since AoPS does not distinguish between usernames with different capitalizations, the capitalization of the player name does not matter. A proper vote looks like [code]Vote: fdas[/code]
      [*] 2.2: Votes may not be placed in hide tags.
      [*] 2.3: Improperly made votes will not be counted under any circumstances. It does not matter if it is the end of the game hammer and everyone revealed their roles. Hint: dont reveal your roles and declare victory until I made the official end of the game post.
      [*] 2.4: You may vote for no hang to occur during a day. Vote this by including in your post [code]Vote: No Hang[/code]
      [*] 2.5: You do not have to unvote before making a new vote, though it is appreciated if you do so. Unvote in the format [code]Vote: Unvote[/code]
      An unvote will undo your previous vote, if any.
      [*] 2.6: Spell the username of the player you wish to vote for exactly. Do not use nicknames.
      [*] 2.7: If at any point in a day more than half of the votes are for a single player, that player will be hanged. It will then immediately be twilight.
      [*] 2.8: If at any point in a day at least half of the votes are for no hang, then there will be no hang. It will then be twilight.
      [*] 2.9: If the deadline is met and no person is hanged, it will be considered no hang and will proceed to be twilight.
      [*] 2.10: The moment the deadline passes, no more votes will be counted even if the mod has not made a post.
      [*] 2.11: During twilight, players may still post. However, no more votes and/or unvotes will be processed.
      [*] 2.12: Once I post a end-of-day scene, the person hanged (if any) is officially dead. Night then immediately begins. You may not post during night.[/list]

      [*] Activity
      [list]
      [*] 3.1: Each day will be 336 hours (2 weeks). The moderator may extend the deadline for the end of the day at his/her discretion. Note that this will be unlikely.
      [*] 3.2: The deadlines will follow the official time
      [*] 3.3: The deadline will occur the very second 336 hours has occurred.
      [*] 3.4: The night deadline will be 72 hours after night begins.
      [*] 3.5: When the night deadline is met, if the moderator does not receive a night action from either a player or his/her partner(s) (if you have them), the player will lose the chance to perform an action during that night.
      [*] 3.6: Any night results will be sent after the night deadline
      [*] 3.7: Night will end at some time after the night deadline when the mod makes the post announcing the end of night.
      [*] 3.8: If a player does not post in a 48-hour period and he/she is not in V/LA, you will receive an in-game prod.
      [*] 3.9: If a player does not post in another 24-hour period after receiving an in-game prod and he/she is not in V/LA, he/she will receive a PM prod.
      [*] 3.10: If a player does not post in another 48-hour period after receiving a PM prod and he/she is not in V/LA, he/she will be replaced, unless you post before the moderator finds a replacement.
      [*] 3.11: If a player receives 5 PM Prods, he/she will be replaced
      [*] 3.12: If a player is going to be V/LA, he/she must post in bold in-thread or PM me. The moderator will not prod the player unless the V/LA is too long.[list]


      [*]Etiquette
      [list]
      [*] 4.1: Do not use inappropriate language.
      [*] 4.2: Do not make any personal attacks.
      [*] 4.3: Follow all of the rules.
      [*] 4.4: Be mature.
      [*] 4.5: For a minor rule infraction, players can receive up to two warnings. If a player commits an infraction after he/she has run out of warnings, or commits a modkill level infraction, he/she will be modkilled or force replaced. Please do not make me modkill you.[/list]


      [*] Moderators/Co-Moderators
      [list]
      [*] 5.1: I fdas am the moderator of Mafia Game 276
      [*] 5.2: Red-colored text (#FF0000) is used for official votecounts and activity checks by the moderators. It is also used for mafia flavor-related posts.
      [*] 5.3: Blue-colored text (#0000FF) is used for the moderator and co-mod's posts other than votecounts and activity checks.
      [*] 5.4: Green-colored text (#00FF00) is used for town flavor-related posts.
      [*] 5.5: The not voting section is to be ignored if it contradicts any other part of the votecount
      [*] 5.6: If an error to the votecount is not pointed out within 5 days, the incorrect votecount will become official.
      [*] 5.7: The moderator may change the rules at any time.
      [*] 5.8: The moderator has the last say in interpreting the rules. [/list]


      [*] Read all of the rules[/list]

      Setup
      This game will use the Matrix6 setup. This is a semi-open setup.

      In this setup, there are 9 players. Three of the roles will be generated randomly by picking a row or column from the matrix. Then one Mafia Goon and 5 Vanilla Townies are added to maintain a 2:7 mafia:town ratio. The six possible setups are:
      1. 5 Vanilla Townies, 1 Town Jailkeeper, 1 1-Shot Bulletproof Townie, 1 Mafia Roleblocker, 1 Mafia Goon
      2. 6 Vanilla Townies, 1 Town Cop, 2 Mafia Goons
      3. 5 Vanilla Townies, 1 Town Doctor, 1 Town Tracker, 2 Mafia Goons
      4. 6 Vanilla Townies, 1 Town Jailkeeper, 2 Mafia Goons
      5. 5 Vanilla Townies, 1 Town Cop, 1 Town Doctor, 1 Mafia Goon, 1 Mafia Roleblocker
      6. 5 Vanilla Townies, 1 1-Shot Bulletproof Townie, 1 Town Tracker, 2 Mafia Goons


      Role PMs
      [quote]You are a Vanilla Townie. You have no other power other than your vote.

      You win when all members of the Mafia are dead.[/quote]

      [quote]You are a Cop. Every night, you may target one person and determine their alignment.

      You win when all members of the Mafia are dead.[/quote]

      [quote]You are a Doctor. Every night you may heal someone, allowing them to survive if they would have otherwise died. You may not heal yourself two nights in a row.

      You win when all members of the Mafia are dead.[/quote]

      [quote]You are a Tracker. Every night you may target someone and learn who they visited.

      You win when all members of the Mafia are dead.[/quote]

      [quote]You are a Jailkeeper. Each night you may choose someone to put in jail. That person will be unable to perform any actions that night and night kills attempting to target that person will be blocked.

      You win when all members of the Mafia are dead.[/quote]

      [quote]You are a 1-Shot Bulletproof Townie. On the first time that you are attacked by the Mafia, that kill will be negated.

      You win when all members of the Mafia are dead.[/quote]

      [quote]You are a Mafia Goon. During the night you may talk with your partner () here to discuss who you want to kill.

      You win when all members of the Town are dead.[/quote]

      [quote]You are a Mafia Roleblocker. During the night you may talk with your partner () here to discuss who you want to kill. You may also target someone and that person will be unable to perform any actions that night. Your ability takes precedence over the jailkeeper.

      You win when all members of the Town are dead.[/quote]


      Alive (6)
      ++NDMath
      +Madelyn
      siddhanth_banik hockeyfox nsd08
      PaperMath BrilliantBanana
      RhinocerosHornbill
      Beast_Academic_Emma candythecorgi


      Dead(3)
      GreyApatosurus MinecraftArchitect BananaBall00 (Vanilla Townie)
      Izzrr Aminecraftbear (Mafia Goon)
      +falliinqsnow (Mafia Roleblocker)

      k Mafia Game 275: Fire vs Water Mafia
      NDMath   3036
      N Dec 30, 2023 by fdas
      Mafia Game 275
      Fire vs Water Mafia


      [list][*]Rules
      [list]
      [*]Read the rules. All of them. Read them multiple times if necessary.
      [*]Do not post at night.
      [*]You may PM me at any time and ask me anything, such as rule clarification.
      [*]Do not quote or pretend to quote any PMs from me, including role PMs.
      [*]Do not talk about this game outside of this topic to anyone other than the mods in charge, unless I specifically allow you to do so.
      [*]Day chat will be enabled via an AoPS private forum.
      [*]You may not use any formatting that has an effect of concealing text. This includes hide="", color=#FFFFFF, and color=white, among others.
      [*]Do not edit or delete posts you have already submitted; this includes editing right after you post (what goes in the thread stays in the thread). If you for any reason find the need to change your post, use EBWOP or EBWON as necessary.
      [*]If you are not a living participant of the game, do not post anything else about the game anywhere. You may still spectate the game, but you may no longer post in this thread.
      [*]When the game starts respond to your role pm with a message in the town flavor color (#f60).
      [*]Do not advocate for breaking the rules.
      [*]Do not imitate the mods.[/list]

      [*] Voting/Hanging
      [list]
      [*]This game will partially use the voting rules philosophy of "if it looks like a vote, it's a vote". So spelling/capitalization does not matter so long as the Vote: part is right, and the following two rules are met.
      [*]Post votes in bold font in the format "Vote: <insert player here>", or c or code text: [code]Vote: <insert player here>[/code].
      [*]Votes may not be placed in hide tags.
      [*]You may vote for no hang to occur during a day. Vote this by including in your post "Vote: No Hang" or: [code]Vote: No Hang[/code].
      [*]You do not have to unvote before making a new vote, though you have the ability to do so. Unvote in the format "Vote: Unvote" or: [code]Vote: Unvote[/code]. An unvote will undo your previous vote, if any.
      [*]If the deadline is met the player with the most votes is hanged. If there is a tie the player who received the votes first is hanged. If No Hang is part of the tie, No Hang occurs.
      [*]Starting day 1, If more than half of the votes are for a single player, that player will be hanged. It will then immediately be twilight.
      [*]Starting day 1, If at least half of the votes are for no hang, then there will be no hang. It will then be twilight.
      [*]The moment the deadline passes, it will be twilight and no more votes will be counted even if the mod has not made a post.
      [*]During twilight, players may still post. However, no more votes and/or unvotes will be processed.
      [*]Once I (or the comod) post a end-of-day scene, the person hanged (if any) is officially dead. Night then immediately begins. You may not post during night.[/list]


      [*] Activity
      [list]
      [*]Each day will be 240 hours (10 days). The moderator may extend the deadline for the end of the day at his/her discretion.
      [*]The deadline will occur the very second 240 hours has occurred.
      [*]The night deadline will be 48 hours after night begins.
      [*]When the night deadline is met, if the moderator does not receive a night action from either a player or his/her partner(s) (if you have them), the player will lose the chance to perform an action during that night.
      [*]Night will end at some time after the night deadline when the mod makes the post announcing the end of night.
      [*]If a player does not post in a 48-hour period and they are not in V/LA, you will receive a PM prod.
      [*]If a player does not post in another 24-hour period after receiving a PM prod and they are not in V/LA, they will be replaced, unless you post before the moderator finds a replacement.
      [*]If a player is going to be V/LA, they must PM me. The moderator will not prod the player unless the V/LA is too long.[list]


      [*]Etiquette
      [list]
      [*]Do not use inappropriate language or make personal attacks.
      [*]Be mature.
      [*]The game is to not be considered over until the mod or co-mod declares it as such.
      [*]Don't intentionally/purposely gamethrow. If you believe you can no longer win talk to me in your role pm.
      [*]For a minor rule infraction, players can receive up to two warnings. If a player commits an infraction after they have run out of warnings, or commits a modkill level infraction, they may be modkilled or force replaced. Please do not make me modkill you.[/list]


      [*] Moderators/Co-Moderators
      [list]
      [*]I (NDMath) am the moderator of Mafia Game 275. Cosmosiq is the comod of Mafia Game 275.
      [*]This brown (#974E03) is my mod color. Do not post in anything too similar. This blue (color=blue) is Cosmosiq's mod color. Do not post in anything too similar.
      [*]The moderator may change the rules at any time.
      [*]The moderator has the last say in interpreting the rules. The co-mod the second to last say.
      [*]Mafia fake claims will be treated symmetrically to town roles.[/list]


      [*] Read all of the rules[/list]
      Story
      A boat was approaching the eastside of the island. And this was a good thing since this was in fact the island the passengers were trying to get to. But this wasn't a perfect thing, for the passengers wanted to arrive on the westside, as that was the inhabited part, and traveling around the island was going to leave them quite vulnerable.

      The Water God patrolled the eastern coast of the island. They were rather mysterious and liked the isolation. The Water God is patient and could destroy anything, given enough time. This particular boat could easily be defeated with a single whirlpool, but it would be far more joyful to the Water God to sink the boat at what would like the last possible moment for things to go wrong to the passengers. After all, it's not every day that a boat comes passing through these waters.

      The Fire God recently took home to the eastern side of the island because of the dense forest. The Fire God was strong and active, often simply destroying whatever was in its path. Often viewed as careless but never afraid to stand up to the darkness of evil. Seeing what was at stake here, the Fire God ordered their minions to attack immediately. It may not be the wisest idea to attack water with fire, but the Fire God would not die easily either in this woodland.

      There were rumors among the minions that Goddess Snow would see the action going on and come interfere. What her motives were, however, was unclear.


      Setup
      The setup is closed, but there is exactly 3 mafia and at most 1 third party aligned player.
      Town is flavored as fire-based/aligned and Mafia is flavored as water-based/aligned.
      Mafia are multitasking by default.

      The action resolution for this game is Reasonable Action Resolution.
      Private Chats are via AoPS forum with daychat enabled.
      No action may self-target unless stated otherwise in the player's role pm.

      [quote=Example Vanilla Townie Role PM]Welcome Cosmosiq to Mafia Game 275

      You are a Fire Minion.

      As a minion, you have no special abilities, but that could change!

      You win when all water-aligned players are dead.[/quote]
      [quote=Example Mafia Goon Role PM]Welcome NDMath to Mafia Game 275

      You are a Water Minion. The town role with matching abilities is called Fire Minion, however this does not confirm the existence of that role only the possibility.

      As a minion, you have no special abilities, but that could change!
      You may also submit your team's factional kill each night, and have access to a private factional chat.

      You win when all fire-aligned players are dead.[/quote]


      Alive (1)
      8. DXtreme - Water God

      Dead (12)
      10. dragonlouis - Water Minion
      13. adrastea violetmx12 - Fire Minion
      7. MinecraftArchitect lovematch13 - Fire Minion
      9. candythecorgi ostriches88 - Fire Minion
      12. saturnrocket - Water Minion
      2. scannose - Heat
      5. Aminecraftbear - Fire Minion
      6. ibmo0907 aayr - Fire Minion
      11. fdas - Fire Minion
      1. WisteriaV - Candle
      3. BananaBall00 = Fire God
      4. cherryolive - Heat


      Notable Stuff
      Day 1 begins
      adrastea replaces violetmx12
      Note/Deadline Extension
      MinecraftArchitect replaces lovematch13
      End of Day 1; Start of Night 1
      End of Night 1; Start of Day 2
      candythecorgi replaces ostriches88
      End of Day 2; Start of Night 2
      ibmo0907 replaces aayr
      End of Night 2; Start of Day 3
      End of Day 3; Start of Night 3
      End of Night 3; Start of Day 4
      End of Game!

      k Mafia Game 274: Quantum Mafia
      snoozingnewt   3445
      N Dec 30, 2023 by fdas
      [center]Welcome to Mafia Game 274: Quantum Mafia

      IMAGE[/center]



      [center]The ghost town where you have been sent finally comes into focus in the dry, dusty Iowa air. Three hours from anywhere significant, this is where the journey is taking place.

      You turn onto a gravel road, winding through endless fields of wheat and corn. Finally you stop at a large house with many cars parked outside of it. The house looks like it was built in the 1990s, almost sixty years ago, in stark contrast to the fancy cars parked all around.

      You park your car and walk into the house. You are greeted by a pair of two physicists whose names you know.

      "Hey, glad you made it," Vernon Barton exclaims, slapping your back.

      "We're excited to have you here," Erick Fischer adds, settling for a nice handshake.

      "Alright," Vernon says, "Let's head back and meet the others."[/center]


      - Important Rules -
      This tab summarizes the most important rules for easy reference.

      For experienced players: everything you need is here, and in the setup tab.
      For new players: you may find it useful to familiarize yourself with the rest of the rules.

      Integrity
      [list][*]Do not edit or delete your posts, even for typos. Just post again.
      [*]Do not OOT (Out of Thread) and talk about this game outside this thread, your role PM, or approved private chats, even if you are dead. Access to spectator chats will be granted upon request.
      [*]Do not gamethrow or intentionally sabotage your wincondition.
      [*]Do not attach files or link to external documents concerning this game. Discussions must stay in this thread.
      [*]Do not use OGI (Out of Game Information). Publicly discussed reads should be made exclusively from information in this thread or past completed games.[/list]

      Activity
      [list][*]Each "Day" is 11 days while each "Night" is 3 days.
      [*]Do not post during night.
      [*]This game uses Dawn start: Day 1 will not start until everyone shows that they have read the rules by completing the confirm task.
      [*]All times will be in Eastern Standard Time (EST, UTC-5) or Eastern Daylight Time (EDT, UTC-4) as applicable.
      [*]Activity rules are 48 hours to first PM prod, 72 hours to second PM prod, and 96 hours to replacement status.
      [*]Minimum deadline for majority hang is 5 days (120 hours)

      Voting
      [list][*]You must format your votes correctly. Capitalization does not matter, and capital i/lowercase L are not differentiated.
      [*]Both bold vote and code vote formats are accepted, although bold is preferred. Refer to the Voting tab if you do not know what these are.
      [*]Majority hang is on for all days after minimum deadline of 120 hours has occurred.
      [*]Deadline hang is on from Day 1 but it is off for LYLO.
      [*]Votes are locked at LYLO.[/list]

      Etiquette and Warnings

      [list][*]Use common sense.
      [*]Do not use formatting that makes text hard to read.
      [*]You may attack a players opinion, but do not make personal attacks on players themselves.
      [*]The above rule does not apply to insulting the user juliankuang. To show your understanding of the rules, insult juliankuang in the thread or in your role PM.
      [*]Disagreements should be resolved in a way that does not affect gameplay.
      [*]Do not discuss rule violations by other players in the thread; contact the moderators privately.
      [*]First-timers can receive up to 3 warnings before their next offense results in a force replacement or modkill. All other players can receive up to 2.
      [*]Players may be replaced at the moderators' discretion for procedural difficulties.
      [*]All other rules are standard.[/list]

      Setup and Moderators

      [list][*]Mafia have access to daychat.
      [*]All role mechanics and Night Action Resolutions are standard.
      [*]This game is moderated by snoozingnewt and ostriches88.
      [*]This game operates optional discord spectator and mafia private chats using the Unpaid Intern Central server. Contact the mods to request access.[/list]

      Resources and Support

      [list][*]For any issues, you may contact us through your role PM or through Discord (@asiago8, @snoozingnewt).
      [*]For a list of basic resources, refer to the Resources tab below.
      [*]For a more extensive list of resources compiled by the UIMT, go here.
      [*]If this game is causing you significant stress or frustration, feel free to use your role PM to talk or vent. We may not be allowed to give you technical advice, but we can listen or help you find a better way to process events. You may also contact us via Discord if you prefer.[/list]


      [list][*]General
      Credits to Binomial-theorem, chaotic_iak, willwang123, and fdas, among others, as well as the Mafia Universe forum rules, for the rule template.

      The following are standard mafia game rules.


      [list][*]Do not post during the night phase.
      [*]Do not talk about this game's events outside of this thread unless you are specifically given permission to do so by the moderators. Details are in the Moderation Policies tab.
      [*]Do not talk about other ongoing games in this thread. Referring to anything that has happened in an ongoing game, even if you do not say which game it is, is OOT.
      [*]If you are dead, do not post, and do not talk about this game anywhere else. You may still spectate; access to spoiled and unspoiled spectator chats will be offered.
      [*]Do not use any formatting that obscures or conceals text. This includes [color=#FFFFFF], [color=white], and [color=transparent].
      [*]Do not edit or delete posts, even for typos: what goes in the thread stays in the thread. Instead, use EBWOP or EBWON as appropriate.
      [*]Do not quote or pretend to quote any PMs from the mods, including role PMs.
      [*]Do not impersonate the mods.
      [*]Do not lie to the mods.
      [*]Do not abuse loopholes in the rules. Intent will be considered during rule enforcement.
      [*]You may use your role PM to ask questions, such as rule clarifications.[/list]


      [*]Votes and Hangs
      This tab covers voting, unvoting, No Hangs, and hangs.


      [list][*]Votes must be in this format to be counted: Vote: [player username].
      [*]By default, votes should be made in [b] (bold) tags. However, votes made in [code] and [c] tags will also be accepted.
      [*]Usernames in votes must be spelled, but not necessarily capitalized, correctly. Do not use nicknames.
      [*]For the purposes of voting, I (capital i) and l (lowercase L) are considered identical.
      [*]For example, both Vote: mathjay and Vote: mAtHjAy are valid votes, but vote: mathjay, Vote: jay, Vote: mathjay., Vote:mathjay, Vote: mathjay, and Vote: mathjay are invalid.
      [*]Votes followed by extraneous punctuation that is similarly formatted, even with separate tags, are invalid.
      [*]Votes in hide, tip, or quote tags do not count.
      [*]Vote to hang no one by posting Vote: No Hang.
      [*]Unvote by posting Unvote. You do not have to unvote before voting again.
      [*]Votecounts will be posted periodically. Players may request a new VC in bold or in their role PM.
      [*]Invalid votes will not count under any circumstances. Consider notifying the mods in your role PM if you want to purposely fakevote.
      [*]Valid votes will always be counted unless they are clearly unintentional. There is no guarantee that an accidental vote will not be counted.
      [*]Votes will be carried over if a player is replaced.
      [*]The Not Voting section should be ignored if it contradicts another part of the votecount (VC).
      [*]If an error in the votecount is not pointed out within 2 days or by the next EOD, whichever is sooner, the incorrect VC will become official.
      [*]This game uses deadline hang: the player with the most votes at the EOD (End of Day) deadline will be hanged.
      [*]If two or more players have the same number of votes at the EOD deadline, the player who reached that number of votes first will be hanged. Details are in the Moderation Policies tab.
      [*]If no votes have been cast by the deadline, no one will be hanged.
      [*]Starting Day 2, if a player is voted by the majority of living players, then that player will be hanged immediately; and if No Hang is voted by half of living players, a No Hang will occur.
      [*]Upon reaching LYLO (Hang-or-Lose), votes will be locked, meaning that they cannot be changed.
      [*]Deadline hang is off at LYLO. If a majority hang is not reached by the deadline, the day will end without a hang, resulting in an automatic win for the mafia team.
      [*]The moment the deadline occurs, no further votes will be counted. Details are in the Moderation Policies tab.
      [*]If the deadline has passed or a hammer has occurred and the EOD has not been declared, the game will proceed into twilight. Players may still post, but no more votes or unvotes will be counted.
      [*]Once the moderators declare the EOD, the person hanged will be officially eliminated and their role revealed. Night will then immediately begin.[/list]

      [*]Activity
      This tab covers deadlines, activity rules, V/LAs, and replacements.


      [list][*]All times will be in Eastern Standard Time (EST, UTC-5) or Eastern Daylight Time (EDT, UTC-4) as applicable, unless otherwise noted.
      [*]Each day phase will be 264 hours (11 days), and each night phase will be 72 hours (3 days).
      [*]The deadline may be extended or reduced by one hour due to the beginning or end of Daylight Savings Time. Players will be told if this happens.
      [*]The moderators may extend deadlines at their discretion.
      [*]The current deadline can be found in the bottom of the OP (Original Post, or post #1).
      [*]If a player with an NA (Night Action) anticipates being unavailable during the night phase, they may submit any night actions to be performed in advance.
      [*]If a player with an NA has not submitted their action by 24 hours before the night deadline, a reminder will be sent.
      [*]If the moderators do not receive an NA submission from a player by the night deadline, the player will not perform an action that night.
      [*]Night results will be sent after the night deadline.
      [*]Night will end when the moderators make a post declaring the end of night (EON). You may not post in the thread until then, even if the night deadline has passed. Instead, PM the mods for updates if they miss a deadline.
      [*]Players who are temporarily unable to fulfill activity requirements can declare a V/LA (Vacation/Long Absence) by posting the V/LA dates in bold in-thread or in their role PM. Players on a V/LA will not be prodded.
      [*]V/LAs should be shorter than one week. For longer absences, contact the moderators for options.
      [*]Players who no longer wish to or are unable to play in this game can request replacement by posting Request Replacement in-thread or in their role PM.
      [*]Players who have replaced out generally will not be allowed to replace back in.
      [*]Players will receive their first PM prod if they have not made a game-advancing post for 48 hours and are not on V/LA. Details on "game-advancing post" are in the Moderation Policies tab.
      [*]Players will receive their second PM prod if they have not made a game-advancing post for 72 hours and are not on V/LA.
      [*]Players will be replaced if they have not made a game-advancing post for 96 hours and are not on V/LA, unless they post before the moderators find a replacement.
      [*]If a player receives 4 PM Prods, they will be replaced.
      [*]If a player reaches replacement status more than once, they will be replaced.
      [*]Activity Checks (ACs) will be posted periodically. Players may request a new AC in bold or in their role PM.
      [*]Activity will reset overnight. Players will not receive prods between twilight and daystart.
      [*]If you have access to a private topic, you may request that a partner be poked. The moderators will send a notification via PM to the specified player, but this will not count as an official prod.
      [*]If a player is postbanned by the AoPS Sheriff, they will be replaced. Details are in the Moderation Policies tab.[list]

      [*]Integrity and Etiquette
      This tab covers integrity recommendations, player etiquette, warning limits, and examples of inconsiderate gameplay.


      [list][*]Do not gamethrow.
      [*]Do not discuss player alignments based on V/LAs, replacements, warnings, force replacements, modkills, or other interactions with moderators.
      [*]Do not discuss rule violations, especially violations by other players in the thread. If you wish, contact the moderators privately through your role PM or Discord.
      [*]Any significant, game-related, and intentionally exclusive player-to-player communication outside of moderator-sanctioned channels is prohibited.
      [*]Do not publicly reference OGI (Out of Game Information) in reads or create situations outside the thread that players could reasonably consider alignment indicative.[/list]

      The above rules are attempts to preserve the spirit of the game and should not affect most players. For specific details and examples, click here.


      [list][*]Do not make personal attacks. You may attack a player's opinion, but do not demean the player themselves.
      [*]Do not spam.
      [*]Follow AoPS Community Guidelines and the AoPS Terms of Service.
      [*]Be mature and use common sense.
      [*]Behavior that disrupts the game for players and makes it unreasonably hard for them to read and play may result in a warning.
      Causing significant disruptions to gameplay may result in a force replacement at the moderators' discretion.
      [*]For minor rule infractions, first-timers can receive up to three warnings, while all other players can receive up to two. A player may receive multiple warnings for a single infraction.[/list]

      The above rules broadly address most etiquette issues. For specific details and examples of improper behavior, click here.


      [*]- Moderation Policies -

      [*]Moderator Information
      This tab provides technical information about this game.


      [list][*]snoozingnewt and ostriches88 are the moderators of Mafia Game 274.
      [*]Credits to fdas for reviewing and improving the setup.
      [*]Credits to mathjay, HannahW, Matheletesv, ad333, chess24, EulerNTM, fdas, and others for OCRSTM and management of the private chat discord system.
      [*]This game uses the Unpaid Intern Central consolidated private chat system. Participants of this game will be granted access as appropriate.
      [*]Red text is used for votecounts, warnings, and other announcements by the moderators. It is also used for mafia flavor-related text.
      [*]Blue text is used for activity checks, confirm counts, and other non-essential posts by the moderators.
      [*]Green text is used for town flavor-related text.
      [*]Custom shades of these colors may be used for aesthetic purposes.
      [*]Current custom shades are: Town flavor green v.2 (#2be368) and Activity Check blue (#005dff). For a full list of custom colors, click here.
      [*]This blue text is snoozingnewt's mod color.
      [*]This orange text is ostriches88's mod color.
      [*]The moderators may change the rules at any time. Major rule changes will be announced at the bottom of the OP. All changes will also be noted in the modlog and OCRSTM Version History.
      [*]Players will not be retroactively penalized for violating new rules.
      [*]Major changes to the OP may be made in between games. The most important changes will be noted in the OCRSTM Version History.
      [*]The moderators pledge to treat players fairly and keep moderator interventions to a minimum; however, we reserve the right to make the final judgement in the moderation of this game.[/list]

      MG274 OP is based on Overcomplicated RulesetTM (OCRSTM) 10.
      Current version: 10.0.1
      Version History

      OCRSTM 10 is available for public use. If you are interested in using OCRSTM in your own games, click here.
      [/list]
      Setup
      This is a 17-player closed setup. There are 13 town-aligned players and 4 mafia-aligned players. All players begin as vanilla roles, and powers are granted each night through an undisclosed process. There are 17 powers in the game, and with the death of a player, their power will be removed from the game.

      At the end of a night, after night actions have been processed, the powers will be changed. A player may receive the same power two nights in a row. Nothing related to power-changing is based on alignment.

      Mafias will be provided with fake town PMs for their character. The flavor was written before alignments were determined, so do not attempt to use PM flavor to deduce alignment.
      Role PMs
      [quote=Town]
      Hello [username], and welcome to Mafia Game 274. You are Alma McDowell (Townie).

      As a professional scientist, you are obsessed with the unknown. You view life as one great adventure, and the exploration of the quantum realm is one more chapter in that adventure. You would love to return from a journey such as this and teach the world about your findings.

      You win when all threats to town are eliminated. Good luck.[/quote]
      [quote=Mafia]
      Hello [username], and welcome to Mafia Game 274. You are Jared Ritter (Mafia).

      As a professional scientist, you are happy with the state of the world right now. You have developed a theory of the universe that is not consistent with many of the observations in the quantum realm, and to see your theory destroyed would be catastrophic to your reputation. You will do anything in your power to prevent the mission from succeeding.

      Your partners are [username] (flavorname), [username] (flavorname), and [username] (flavorname). You can communicate with your partners at any time here.

      You win when the mafia achieve parity, or when nothing can prevent this from happening. Good luck.[/quote]


      Alive (15)

      k Mafia Game 273: UIC Invitational IX
      Mathletesv   1811
      N Dec 30, 2023 by fdas
      [center]Welcome to Mafia Game 273
      UIC Invitational IX[/center]

      die euler die
      let the euler funeral commence
      - snow

      - Important Rules -
      This tab summarizes the most important rules for easy reference.

      For experienced players: everything you need is here, and in the setup tab.
      For new players: you may find it useful to familiarize yourself with the rest of the rules.

      Integrity
      [list][*]Do not edit or delete your posts, even for typos. Just post again.
      [*]Do not OOT (Out of Thread) and talk about this game outside this thread, your role PM, or approved private chats, even if you are dead. Access to spectator chats will be granted upon request.
      [*]Do not gamethrow or intentionally sabotage your wincondition.
      [*]Do not attach files or link to external documents concerning this game. Discussions must stay in this thread.
      [*]Do not use OGI (Out of Game Information). Publicly discussed reads should be made exclusively from information in this thread or past completed games.[/list]

      Activity
      [list][*]Each "Day" is 7 days while each "Night" is 2 days.
      [*]Do not post during night.
      [*]All times will be in Eastern Standard Time (EST, UTC-5) or Eastern Daylight Time (EDT, UTC-4) as applicable.
      [*]Activity rules are 48 hours to first PM prod, 72 hours to second PM prod, and 96 hours to replacement status.[/list]

      Voting
      [list][*]You must format your votes correctly. Capitalization does not matter, and capital i/lowercase L are not differentiated.
      [*]Both bold vote and code vote formats are accepted, although bold is preferred. Refer to the Voting tab if you do not know what these are.
      [*]Majority hang is always on but cannot end day before the minimum deadline has elapsed.
      [*]Deadline hang is always on except for LYLO.
      [*]Votes are locked at LYLO.[/list]

      Etiquette and Warnings

      [list][*]Use common sense.
      [*]Do not use formatting that makes text hard to read.
      [*]You may attack a players opinion, but do not make personal attacks on players themselves.
      [*]Disagreements should be resolved in a way that does not affect gameplay.
      [*]Do not discuss rule violations by other players in the thread; contact the moderators privately.
      [*]First-timers can receive up to 3 warnings before their next offense results in a force replacement or modkill. All other players can receive up to 2.
      [*]Players may be replaced at the moderators' discretion for procedural difficulties.
      [*]All other rules are standard.[/list]

      Setup and Moderators

      [list][*]This game is based on the D6 Setup.
      [*]Mafia have access to daychat.
      [*]All role mechanics and Night Action Resolutions are standard.
      [*]This game is moderated by Mathletesv.
      [*]This game operates optional discord spectator and mafia private chats using the Unpaid Intern Central server. Contact the mods to request access.[/list]

      Resources and Support

      [list][*]For any issues, you may contact us through your role PM or through Discord (msv25).
      [*]For a list of basic resources, refer to the Resources tab below.
      [*]For a more extensive list of resources compiled by the UIMT, go here.
      [*]If this game is causing you significant stress or frustration, feel free to use your role PM to talk or vent. We may not be allowed to give you technical advice, but we can listen or help you find a better way to process events. You may also contact us via Discord if you prefer.[/list]


      [list][*]General
      Credits to Binomial-theorem, chaotic_iak, willwang123, and fdas, among others, as well as the Mafia Universe forum rules, for the rule template.

      The following are standard mafia game rules.


      [list][*]Do not post during the night phase.
      [*]Do not talk about this game's events outside of this thread unless you are specifically given permission to do so by the moderators. Details are in the Moderation Policies tab.
      [*]Do not talk about other ongoing games in this thread. Referring to anything that has happened in an ongoing game, even if you do not say which game it is, is OOT.
      [*]If you are dead, do not post, and do not talk about this game anywhere else. You may still spectate; access to spoiled and unspoiled spectator chats will be offered.
      [*]Do not use any formatting that obscures or conceals text. This includes [color=#FFFFFF], [color=white], and [color=transparent].
      [*]Do not edit or delete posts, even for typos: what goes in the thread stays in the thread. Instead, use EBWOP or EBWON as appropriate.
      [*]Do not quote or pretend to quote any PMs from the mods, including role PMs.
      [*]Do not impersonate the mods.
      [*]Do not lie to the mods.
      [*]Do not abuse loopholes in the rules. Intent will be considered during rule enforcement.
      [*]You may use your role PM to ask questions, such as rule clarifications.[/list]


      [*]Votes and Hangs
      This tab covers voting, unvoting, No Hangs, and hangs.


      [list][*]Votes must be in this format to be counted: Vote: [player username].
      [*]By default, votes should be made in [b] (bold) tags. However, votes made in [code] and [c] tags will also be accepted.
      [*]Usernames in votes must be spelled, but not necessarily capitalized, correctly. Do not use nicknames.
      [*]For the purposes of voting, I (capital i) and l (lowercase L) are considered identical.
      [*]For example, both Vote: mathjay and Vote: mAtHjAy are valid votes, but vote: mathjay, Vote: jay, Vote: mathjay., Vote:mathjay, Vote: mathjay, and Vote: mathjay are invalid.
      [*]Votes followed by extraneous punctuation that is similarly formatted, even with separate tags, are invalid.
      [*]Votes in hide, tip, or quote tags do not count.
      [*]Vote to hang no one by posting Vote: No Hang.
      [*]Unvote by posting Unvote. You do not have to unvote before voting again.
      [*]Votecounts will be posted periodically. Players may request a new VC in bold or in their role PM.
      [*]Invalid votes will not count under any circumstances. Consider notifying the mods in your role PM if you want to purposely fakevote.
      [*]Valid votes will always be counted unless they are clearly unintentional. There is no guarantee that an accidental vote will not be counted.
      [*]Votes will be carried over if a player is replaced.
      [*]The Not Voting section should be ignored if it contradicts another part of the votecount (VC).
      [*]If an error in the votecount is not pointed out within 2 days or by the next EOD, whichever is sooner, the incorrect VC will become official.
      [*]This game uses deadline hang: the player with the most votes at the EOD (End of Day) deadline will be hanged.
      [*]If two or more players have the same number of votes at the EOD deadline, the player who reached that number of votes first will be hanged. Details are in the Moderation Policies tab.
      [*]If no votes have been cast by the deadline, no one will be hanged.
      [*]Starting Day 1, if a player is voted by the majority of living players after the minimum deadline has elapsed, then that player will be hanged immediately; and if No Hang is voted by half of living players, a No Hang will occur.
      [*]Upon reaching LYLO (Hang-or-Lose), votes will be locked, meaning that they cannot be changed.
      [*]Deadline hang is off at LYLO. If a majority hang is not reached by the deadline, the day will end without a hang, resulting in an automatic win for the mafia team.
      [*]The moment the deadline occurs, no further votes will be counted. Details are in the Moderation Policies tab.
      [*]If the deadline has passed or a hammer has occurred and the EOD has not been declared, the game will proceed into twilight. Players may still post, but no more votes or unvotes will be counted.
      [*]Once the moderators declare the EOD, the person hanged will be officially eliminated and their role revealed. Night will then immediately begin.[/list]

      [*]Activity
      This tab covers deadlines, activity rules, V/LAs, and replacements.


      [list][*]All times will be in Eastern Standard Time (EST, UTC-5) or Eastern Daylight Time (EDT, UTC-4) as applicable, unless otherwise noted.
      [*]Each day phase will be 168 hours (7 days), and each night phase will be 48 hours (2 days).
      [*]Players are required to post at a minimum of 5 times each 48 hours. These posts must be game-advancing and NOT fillers. This will be moderated harshly.
      [*]The moderators may extend deadlines at their discretion.
      [*]The current deadline can be found in the bottom of the OP (Original Post, or post #1).
      [*]If a player with an NA (Night Action) anticipates being unavailable during the night phase, they may submit any night actions to be performed in advance.
      [*]If a player with an NA has not submitted their action by 24 hours before the night deadline, a reminder will be sent.
      [*]If the moderators do not receive an NA submission from a player by the night deadline, the player will not perform an action that night.
      [*]Night results will be sent after the night deadline.
      [*]Night will end when the moderators make a post declaring the end of night (EON). You may not post in the thread until then, even if the night deadline has passed. Instead, PM the mods for updates if they miss a deadline.
      [*]Players who are temporarily unable to fulfill activity requirements can declare a V/LA (Vacation/Long Absence) by posting the V/LA dates in bold in-thread or in their role PM. Players on a V/LA will not be prodded.
      [*]V/LAs should be shorter than one week. For longer absences, contact the moderators for options.
      [*]Players who no longer wish to or are unable to play in this game can request replacement by posting Request Replacement in-thread or in their role PM.
      [*]Players who have replaced out generally will not be allowed to replace back in.
      [*]Players will receive their first PM prod if they have not made a game-advancing post for 48 hours and are not on V/LA. Details on "game-advancing post" are in the Moderation Policies tab.
      [*]Players will receive their second PM prod if they have not made a game-advancing post for 72 hours and are not on V/LA.
      [*]Players will be replaced if they have not made a game-advancing post for 96 hours and are not on V/LA, unless they post before the moderators find a replacement.
      [*]If a player receives 4 PM Prods, they will be replaced.
      [*]If a player reaches replacement status more than once, they will be replaced.
      [*]Activity Checks (ACs), Votecounts (VCs), and Postcounts (PCs) will be posted periodically, typically once in 24 hours. Players may request a new AC or VC in bold or in their role PM.
      [*]Activity will reset overnight. Players will not receive prods between twilight and daystart.
      [*]If you have access to a private topic, you may request that a partner be poked. The moderators will send a notification via PM to the specified player, but this will not count as an official prod.
      [*]If a player is postbanned by the AoPS Sheriff, they will be replaced. Details are in the Moderation Policies tab.[list]

      [*]Integrity and Etiquette
      This tab covers integrity recommendations, player etiquette, warning limits, and examples of inconsiderate gameplay.


      [list][*]Do not gamethrow.
      [*]Do not discuss player alignments based on V/LAs, replacements, warnings, force replacements, modkills, or other interactions with moderators.
      [*]Do not discuss rule violations, especially violations by other players in the thread. If you wish, contact the moderators privately through your role PM or Discord.
      [*]Any significant, game-related, and intentionally exclusive player-to-player communication outside of moderator-sanctioned channels is prohibited.
      [*]Do not publicly reference OGI (Out of Game Information) in reads or create situations outside the thread that players could reasonably consider alignment indicative.[/list]

      The above rules are attempts to preserve the spirit of the game and should not affect most players. For specific details and examples, click here.


      [list][*]Do not make personal attacks. You may attack a player's opinion, but do not demean the player themselves.
      [*]Do not spam.
      [*]Follow AoPS Community Guidelines and the AoPS Terms of Service.
      [*]Be mature and use common sense.
      [*]Behavior that disrupts the game for players and makes it unreasonably hard for them to read and play may result in a warning.
      Causing significant disruptions to gameplay may result in a force replacement at the moderators' discretion.
      [*]For minor rule infractions, first-timers can receive up to three warnings, while all other players can receive up to two. A player may receive multiple warnings for a single infraction.[/list]

      The above rules broadly address most etiquette issues. For specific details and examples of improper behavior, click here.


      [*]- Moderation Policies -

      [*]Moderator Information
      This tab provides technical information about this game.


      [list][*]Mathletesv is the moderator of Mafia Game 273.
      [*]Other Unpaid Interns have contributed to flavor, setup, OCRSTM, feedback, and management of the private chat discord system.
      [*]This game uses the Unpaid Intern Central consolidated private chat system. Participants of this game will be granted access as appropriate.
      [*]Red text is used for votecounts, warnings, and other announcements by the moderators. It is also used for mafia flavor-related text.
      [*]Blue text is used for activity checks, confirm counts, and other non-essential posts by the moderators.
      [*]Green text is used for town flavor-related text.
      [*]Purple text is used for third-party flavor-related text.
      [*]Custom shades of these colors may be used for aesthetic purposes.
      [*]Current custom shades are: Town flavor green v.2 (#2be368) and Activity Check blue (#005dff). For a full list of custom colors, click here.
      [*]The moderators may change the rules at any time. Major rule changes will be announced at the bottom of the OP. All changes will also be noted in the modlog and OCRSTM Version History.
      [*]Players will not be retroactively penalized for violating new rules.
      [*]Major changes to the OP may be made in between games. The most important changes will be noted in the OCRSTM Version History.
      [*]The moderators pledge to treat players fairly and keep moderator interventions to a minimum; however, we reserve the right to make the final judgement in the moderation of this game.[/list]

      MG261 OP is based on Overcomplicated RulesetTM (OCRSTM) 10.
      Current version: 10.8 (Minimum Deadlines Standard Non-newbie)
      Version History

      OCRSTM 10 is available for public use. If you are interested in using OCRSTM in your own games, click here.
      [/list]Setup
      This game is based on the D6 setup. This is a semi-open variable setup.

      In this setup, there are 13 players. Please see this or this for full explanation on how the setup works.

      You are NOT allowed to flavor claim.

      Role PMs
      [quote=Vanilla Townie Role PM]
      Hello, [player]!

      You are a Flavor (Vanilla Townie).

      insert flavor here

      Your power lies in your observation skills, your voice, and your vote.

      You win when all Mafia are killed, so your goal is to find them. Play towards your win condition, and good luck.

      Click here to go to the game thread.
      [/quote]
      [quote=Town Cop Role PM]
      Hello, [player]!

      You are the Flavor (Town Cop w/ N0 Peek).

      insert flavor here

      Once each night starting from Night 1, you may PM the mods the name of a player. You will check their alignment, finding out whether they are Town or Mafia. You will be informed if your action was blocked.

      During Night 0, you will also receive a randomized check of a townie's alignment.

      You win when all Mafia are killed, so your goal is to find them. Play towards your win condition, and good luck.

      Click here to go to the game thread.
      [/quote]

      [quote=Town Innocent Child Role PM]
      Hello, [player]!

      You are a Flavor (Town Innocent Child).

      insert flavor here

      Any time during the day, you may PM the mods and request them to claim your innocence. Claiming your innocence announces your role and alignment in the game thread.

      You win when all Mafia are killed, so your goal is to find them. Play towards your win condition, and good luck.

      Click here to go to the game thread.[/quote]

      [quote=Town Role Oracle Role PM]
      Hello, [player]!

      You are a Flavor (Town Role Oracle).

      insert flavor here

      Every night, you may submit a target. If your action is not prevented from resolving, the role, and any modifiers, of your target will be revealed if/when you die. If your action is prevented from resolving, the role, and any modifiers, of your most recent successful target will be revealed. Vanilla Townies and Mafia Goons inspect as Vanilla.

      You win when all Mafia are killed, so your goal is to find them. Play towards your win condition, and good luck.

      Click here to go to the game thread.[/quote]

      [quote=Town Role Cop Role PM]
      Hello, [player]!

      You are a Flavor (Town Role Cop).

      insert flavor here

      Once each night starting from Night 1, you may submit a target. Your target's role, including any modifiers, will be revealed to you. You will be informed if your action is blocked.

      You win when all Mafia are killed, so your goal is to find them. Play towards your win condition, and good luck.

      Click here to go to the game thread.[/quote]

      [quote=Town Tracker Role PM]
      Hello, [player]!

      You are a Flavor (Town Tracker).

      insert flavor here

      Once each night starting from Night 1, you may submit a target. You will track your target's actions and receive a result once all night actions are processed.

      You win when all Mafia are killed, so your goal is to find them. Play towards your win condition, and good luck.

      Click here to go to the game thread.[/quote]

      [quote=Town Parity Cop Role PM]
      Hello, [player]!

      You are a Flavor (Town Parity Cop).

      insert flavor here

      Once each night starting from Night 1, you may submit to inspect a target. Starting from Night 2, you will receive a result that reveals whether your target's alignment matches your previous target's alignment.

      You win when all Mafia are killed, so your goal is to find them. Play towards your win condition, and good luck.

      Click here to go to the game thread.[/quote]

      [quote=Town Bodyguard Role PM]
      Hello, [player]!

      You are a Flavor (Town Bodyguard).

      insert flavor here

      Once each night starting from Night 1, you may submit to guard a target. If your target dies on the same night you submitted your action, you will die instead of your target.

      You win when all Mafia are killed, so your goal is to find them. Play towards your win condition, and good luck.

      Click here to go to the game thread.[/quote]

      [quote=Town Doctor Role PM]
      Hello, [player]!

      You are a Flavor (Town Doctor).

      insert flavor here

      Once each night starting from Night 1, you may submit to protect a target. This will protect your target from one killing action during the night.

      You win when all Mafia are killed, so your goal is to find them. Play towards your win condition, and good luck.

      Click here to go to the game thread.[/quote]

      [quote=Town Jailkeeper Role PM]
      Hello, [player]!

      You are a Flavor (Town Jailkeeper).

      insert flavor here

      Once each night starting from Night 1, you may submit to jailkeep a target. This will protect your target from dying during the night, as well as block that player from being able to successfully use their night action. You may not jailkeep the same target in consecutive nights.

      You win when all Mafia are killed, so your goal is to find them. Play towards your win condition, and good luck.

      Click here to go to the game thread.[/quote]

      [quote=Town Roleblocker Role PM]
      Hello, [player]!

      You are a Flavor (Town Roleblocker).

      insert flavor here

      Once each night starting from Night 1, you may submit to roleblock a target. This will prevent that player from being able to successfully use any night action they have during that night.

      You win when all Mafia are killed, so your goal is to find them. Play towards your win condition, and good luck.

      Click here to go to the game thread.[/quote]

      [quote=Town Vigilante Role PM]
      Hello, [player]!

      You are a Flavor (Town Vigilante).

      insert flavor here

      Once each night starting from Night 1, you may submit a target. Players targeted with this target will die at the end of the night unless protected.

      You win when all Mafia are killed, so your goal is to find them. Play towards your win condition, and good luck.

      Click here to go to the game thread.[/quote]

      [quote=Town 1-Shot Vigilante Role PM]
      Hello, [player]!

      You are a Flavor (Town 1-Shot Vigilante).

      insert flavor here

      Once per game, you may submit a target. Players targeted with this target will die at the end of the night unless protected.

      You win when all Mafia are killed, so your goal is to find them. Play towards your win condition, and good luck.

      Click here to go to the game thread.[/quote]

      [quote=Town 2-Shot Vigilante Role PM]
      Hello, [player]!

      You are a Flavor (Town 2-Shot Vigilante).

      insert flavor here

      Twice per game, you may submit a target. Players targeted with this target will die at the end of the night unless protected.

      You win when all Mafia are killed, so your goal is to find them. Play towards your win condition, and good luck.

      Click here to go to the game thread.[/quote]

      [quote=Mafia Goon Role PM]
      Hello, [player]!

      You are Flavor (Mafia Goon).

      insert flavor here

      Your partners are [player] ([role]) and [player] ([role]), and you may discuss with them in this private forum while you are alive. The two of you will be able to choose a player to kill each night, as well as decide who makes the kill.

      You win when the Mafia are the only ones left, or if nothing can prevent this, so your goal is to stay hidden and kill Town. Play towards your win condition, and good luck.

      Click here to go to the game thread.
      [/quote]

      [quote=Mafia Roleblocker Role PM]
      Hello, [player]!

      You are a Flavor (Mafia Roleblocker).

      insert flavor here

      Once each night starting from Night 1, you may submit to roleblock a target. This will prevent that player from being able to successfully use any night action they have during that night.

      Your partners are [player] ([role]) and [player] ([role]), and you may discuss with them in this private forum while you are alive. The two of you will be able to choose a player to kill each night, as well as decide who makes the kill.

      You win when the Mafia are the only ones left, or if nothing can prevent this, so your goal is to stay hidden and kill Town. Play towards your win condition, and good luck.
      Click here to go to the game thread.[/quote]

      [quote=Mafia Jailkeeper Role PM]
      Hello, [player]!

      You are a Flavor (Mafia Jailkeeper).

      insert flavor here

      Once each night starting from Night 1, you may submit to jailkeep a target. This will protect your target from dying during the night, as well as block that player from being able to successfully use their night action. You may not jailkeep the same target in consecutive nights.

      Your partners are [player] ([role]) and [player] ([role]), and you may discuss with them in this private forum while you are alive. The two of you will be able to choose a player to kill each night, as well as decide who makes the kill.

      You win when the Mafia are the only ones left, or if nothing can prevent this, so your goal is to stay hidden and kill Town. Play towards your win condition, and good luck.
      Click here to go to the game thread.
      [/quote]

      [quote=Mafia Role Cop Role PM]
      Hello, [player]!

      You are a Flavor (Mafia Role Cop).

      insert flavor here

      Once each night starting from Night 1, you may submit a target. Your target's role, including any modifiers, will be revealed to you. You will be informed if your action is blocked.

      Your partners are [player] ([role]) and [player] ([role]), and you may discuss with them in this private forum while you are alive. The two of you will be able to choose a player to kill each night, as well as decide who makes the kill.

      You win when the Mafia are the only ones left, or if nothing can prevent this, so your goal is to stay hidden and kill Town. Play towards your win condition, and good luck.
      Click here to go to the game thread.
      [/quote]

      [quote=Mafia Tracker Role PM]
      Hello, [player]!

      You are a Flavor (Mafia Tracker).

      insert flavor here

      Once each night starting from Night 1, you may submit a target. You will track your target's actions and receive a result once all night actions are processed.

      Your partners are [player] ([role]) and [player] ([role]), and you may discuss with them in this private forum while you are alive. The two of you will be able to choose a player to kill each night, as well as decide who makes the kill.

      You win when the Mafia are the only ones left, or if nothing can prevent this, so your goal is to stay hidden and kill Town. Play towards your win condition, and good luck.
      Click here to go to the game thread.[/quote]

      [quote=Mafia Watcher Role PM]
      Hello, [player]!

      You are a Flavor (Mafia Watcher).

      insert flavor here

      Once each night starting from Night 1, you may submit a target. You will watch your target's actions and receive a result informing you of who used an action on that player that night.

      Your partners are [player] ([role]) and [player] ([role]), and you may discuss with them in this private forum while you are alive. The two of you will be able to choose a player to kill each night, as well as decide who makes the kill.

      You win when the Mafia are the only ones left, or if nothing can prevent this, so your goal is to stay hidden and kill Town. Play towards your win condition, and good luck.
      Click here to go to the game thread.[/quote]

      A Beginner's Guide to Being Awesome at Mafia - This MafiaWiki article explains some basic scumhunting techniques and scum strategy.

      Mafia FAQ - This post has a glossary of commonly used terms and an overview of how the game works.
      Mafia Universe Wiki: Terminology - This is a more comprehensive list of mafia terminology; it includes some terms that are not as commonly used in this forum.
      This forum has posts written by experienced AoPS Mafia players on their methods for playing the game.
      Automatic ISO Code - This post contains code (written by casi and improved by Mathletesv) that will automatically quote all posts by a given player within a given range of posts.

      Game Table of Contents
       


      Current phase: Day 4
      Phase Deadline: September 27th, 9 EST
      1811 replies
      Mathletesv
      Aug 22, 2023
      fdas
      Dec 30, 2023
      J
      H
      h 
      k Mafia Game 272: TeeHee Mafia
      Socoobo   609
      N Dec 30, 2023 by fdas
      [center]Welcome to Mafia Game 272

      TeeHeeTM Mafia

      "TeeHee. TeeHee teeHeE? TeeeeeeeeeHeeeeee! TEEHEE teeHee TeEhEe..."teehee teehee
      teehee teehee teehee teehee teehee teehee teehee teehee teehee- Abraham Lincoln, probably
      [/center]

      The Most Important Rule
      Any post in this game, whether in the game thread or in private chats, must not contain any content except the following:
      [list]
      [*]Variants Of TeeHee
      A word is a variant of 'TeeHee' if and only if it begins with a single occurrence of the letter 't', followed by at least two occurrences of the letter 'e', followed by a single occurrence of the letter 'h', followed by at least two occurrences of the letter 'e'. Case does not matter; any letter in the word can be uppercase or lowercase.

      For example, the following are variants of the word "teehee":
      [list]
      [*]teehee
      [*]teeeeeeeeeheeeeeeeee
      [*]tEeEhEeE
      [*]TEEEEEEEEHEE
      [/list]

      The following are not variants of the word "teehee":
      [list]
      [*]tehee (only one 'e' between 't' and 'h')
      [*]teahee (misplaced 'a')
      [*]tee hee (space between 'tee' and 'hee')
      [*]TEEHHEE (two occurrences of 'h')
      [/list]

      [*]Valid Punctuation
      Punctuation is considered valid if they are placed in a way consistent to how they would be placed in a grammatically correct sentence.

      For example, the following are valid punctuation:
      [list]
      [*]Teehee!
      [*]teeHee.
      [*]TeeHee - teehee?
      [*](TEEEEEEHEEEEEE)
      [/list]

      The following are not considered valid punctuation:
      [list]
      [*]- . . .... . . (Morse code is not allowed)
      [*]:) (emojis are not allowed)
      [/list]

      [*]BBCode and Markdown
      [*]Valid Votes and Night Actions
      [/list]
      Any post that intentionally violates the spirit of this rule will receive a warning. Three warnings result in a modkill.

      You do not have to obey this rule within your role PM. Feel free to ask any questions you like or just vent your frustration at me for taking away your freedom of speech.

      All The Other Rules
      None of you are newbies. All the other rules are the exact same as every other game you've ever played. There is no confirm rule.

      Nothing to see here.

      Go away.


      Game Information
      [list]
      [*]Phase lengths are 48 | 24. The game is Day start. There is no Dawn.
      [*]Majority hang is always on.
      [*]Players must post at least per Day phase, or they will be replaced. Due to the nature of the game, all posts are considered game-advancing; there is no such thing as an activity post.
      [*]Mafia have daychat.
      [*]Night actions are not compulsive.
      [*]All investigative results are sane.
      [*]Doctors and other healing actions may not self-target.
      [/list]

      Setup
      I make absolutely zero guarantees that this setup is balanced. Play this game at your own risk.

      The setup is closed. The setup consists of 11 town players and 3 anti-town players.

      Role PMs follow the following template:
      [quote=Socoobo]
      TeeHee, [name]! TeeHee tEEhEE teehee... role name
      [role information]
      . tEeHeE? TEEHEE!
      [/quote]
      No fake claims are provided since... well, you can't claim anything anyway, TeeHee.


      Players
      1. ad333
      2. falliinqsnow-
      3. WisteriaV/saturnrocket (Town Lover)
      4. Scipio1
      5. Mathletesv (Vanilla Townie)
      6. lucaswujc (Mafia Goon)
      7. candythecorgi (Vanilla Townie)
      8. Chrisalonaliverspur
      9. scannose
      10. snoozingnewt
      11. Madelyn (Vanilla Townie)
      12. lovematch13
      13. ostriches88 (Mafia Fruit Vendor)
      14. mathjay (Town Lover)


      Game over. Congrats to town for winning.
